name: Rubber-Cal Rubber Anti-Vibration Mat - 1/4 x 4ft Wide x 4ft Long - Black Washing Machine Vibration Mat
description:
• 1/4 inch thick anti vibration mat made from recycled rubber
  • Designed to withstand heavy equipment and for appliance floor protection
  • Tough washing machine mat absorbs vibration and isolates noise from washer and dryer equipment
  • 100% recycled rubber tires act as a fantastic antivibration and floor protector mat
  • package included 1pc

Product description

Rubber-Cal's recycled rolled rubber mat and flooring option that is available in 2 gauges: a 1/4 inch thick and a 3/8 inch thick. This flooring option is perfect for a variety of antivibration and floor protection applications. Because the material is domestically made with 100% recycled rubber, this mat is both socially and ecologically responsible. This product is excellent for indoor or outdoor applications due to high contents of EPDM (i.e., a UV/Ozone resistant elastomer) found in the recycled tire rubber. Recycled rubber is a superior material for reducing noise, containing vibration, and absorbing shock from workout equipment. This floor protector mat is specifically manufactured for durability and is designed for both residential and commercial applications often exposed to heavy foot traffic. Moreover, the space-age polyurethane based binder used during the manufacturing process enhances rubber's natural anti-fatigue qualities. Each washing machine vibration mat is fabricated from thousands of rubber granules and offers superior underfoot comfort and support along with a resilient cushioning for the shock of running, exercising, walking and standing. One of the biggest concerns commonly associated with rubber matting is its installation. However, this anti vibration pat weighs roughly 50lbs in a 4ft x 10ft roll and generally lies flat under its own weight; therefore there is no need for permanent adhesives

  • package included 1pc

name: IFB 7 kg Fully-Automatic Front Loading Washing Machine (Elite Aqua VX )
description:
• Fully-automatic front-loading washing machine; 7 kg capacity
  • Warranty: 4 years comprehensive warranty on product
  • 3 wash programs
  • It is equipped with a crescent moon shaped drum that protects your clothes during wash and rinse
  • It has a foam control system that automatically senses generation of foam and dissolves it, leading to improved wash quality

Product description

IFB Elite VX Fully Automatic Front Loading Washing Machine is equipped with a crescent moon shaped drum that protects your clothes during wash and rinse. It has an auto imbalance system that automatically balances the load inside the drum. To prevent excessive foam, the Elite VX front loader washing machine has a foam control system that automatically senses generation of foam and dissolves it, leading to improved wash quality. It has a great feature for quick laundry. With Laundry Add feature, you can add laundry after the wash cycle has begun. The machine has a strong and durable body and to protect it from possible damage by rodents, the machine is fixed with a protective rat mesh at the bottom. Elite VX front loader washing machine has 7 kg capacity and implements air bubble wash system that helps remove even the most stubborn of dirt. This front loader washing machine involves 3D Wash System or 2D Shower System that ensures 100 percent penetration of detergent during wash and 100 percent penetration of water during rinse, resulting in cleaner and fresher looking clothes.

• Fully-automatic front-loading washing machine; 7 kg capacity
  • Warranty: 4 years comprehensive warranty on product
  • 3 wash programs
  • It is equipped with a crescent moon shaped drum that protects your clothes during wash and rinse
  • It has a foam control system that automatically senses generation of foam and dissolves it, leading to improved wash quality

name: IFB AW6501RB Electronic Top-loading Washing Machine (6.5 Kg, Silver and Red)
description:
• Electronic top-loading washing machine; 6.5 kg capacity
  • 2 years warranty on the product
  • Temperature options: Hot, mixed and cold
  • Hot or cold water inlet, 7 segment LED display, stainless steel drum
  • Aqua spa wash, 3D wash system, air bubble wash, pebble drum and swirling tornado wash

Product description

From the Manufacturer

The Aqua Spa feature of the AW6501RB surrounds your clothes with water sprays, soaks your clothes thoroughly and gives you 100% clean clothes. The Pebble Drum feature prevents damage to delicate fabrics such as silk and wool. All the while, keeping them looking great.

Wash Care Programs
Different fabrics deserve different wash cycles. Now, choose a cycle that best suits your fabrics. Simply select the programme on the Wash Care Programme panel and your machine will take care of the rest.

Aqua Spa - 7 Step Wash
Remove those tough stains through a 7-stage wash cycle. The Aqua Spa helps you remove the most stubborn of dirt, giving you the cleanest wash possible.

My Wash
Running late? Simply schedule a shorter wash cycle. The My Wash feature helps you customise the wash as per your needs and schedule.

Pebble Drum
Give delicate fabrics such as silk and wool the perfect wash. The pebbles in the drum prevent damage while the unique shape prevents clothes from getting entangled.

See Through Lid
Keep an eye on your laundry and wash cycle without hampering it, through the wide, transparent lid, made of scratch free, tempered glass, which is stronger and more durable than conventional plastic.

3D Waterfall Technology
The 3D Waterfall Technology adds dynamic movement to the water, dissolving your detergent completely. This also makes for a great rinse action, that makes the water penetrate deep into clothes, removing all traces of detergent from large laundry too.

Swirling Tornado Wash
Powerful tornados created by 3 spinners on the bottom of the drum help detergent act better. This pampers the fabric by loosening the dirt and washing it away.

Centre Punch
The Power Punch located in the centre of the drum moves up and down. This, along with the rotating movement of the pulsator, punches the clothes up with a force and disintegrates minute dirt particles.

Scrub Board Wash
The twin wash boards replicate the effectiveness of the scrubbing action of hands, thus gently scrubbing the dirt off.

Air Bubble Wash System
Most dirt can be tough and stubborn. Your IFB washing machine generates air bubbles that penetrate the cloth fibres. These mix with your detergent and give you the best wash possible.

Dirt Sways Away
The drum sways in a gentle dance-like movement to separate the dirt from the clothes. This movement also helps balance the load evenly in the drum.

High Speed Revolutions
A swift spinning drains away the loose dirt, wrings out the excess soap from the load and readies to rinse the clothes.

name: LG F1496ADP24 Six Motion Direct Drive Fully-automatic Front-loading Washing Machine (8 Kg, Silver)
description:
• Front-loading washing machine
  • Highlights: 300mm door diameter, six motion, fuzzy logic, baby care, quick 30 program and crease care
  • General Specifications: 95 degree temperature range, fault diagnosis, remaining time delay display and 4 spin speed options
  • Capacity:Washer=8kg and Dryer=4kg
  • Wash Programs: Cotton, baby care, delicate, wool, quick 30 and rinse plus spin
  • Optional Programs: Crease care, rinse hold, rinse plus, pre wash, child lock

Description for LG F1496ADP24 Six Motion Direct Drive Fully-automatic Front-loading Washing Machine

Product Description

A durable heavy duty automatic washing machine, it is capable of handling different kinds of laundry in a seamless operation. The machine does not just wash clothes; it has been engineered to withstand high temperatures and also disinfects all parts before giving the clothes a hygienic wash.

Noiseless and energy efficient: The LG F1496ADP24 Six Motion Direct Drive Fully-automatic Front-loading Washing Machine, when at work, generates very little vibrations giving the wash cycle a noiseless task. As the name suggests, motor of the LG six motion direct drive washing machine is attached directly to the drum and there is no conveyor belt or pulley that links the two parts. The direct drive engineering reduces transmission of vibrations in the machine as well as also makes better use of energy used to drive the operation. Since the engineering uses very few mechanical parts, the dissipation of energy is low; this ultimately enhances the washing performance levels. Drawing its power directly from the motor does reduce the noise level considerably.

No water wastage: The direct drive systems passes on a smooth flow when speeds change during the washing operation. This seamless operation makes use of only the required amount of water; it helps cut down on extra water usage.

Disinfects clothes: This washing machine reduces the possibility fungus or toxic deposits being left behind on the clothes after a wash because not only does it have a tub clean function, it also washes the tub with hot steam on a regular basis; the machine even uses a high spin speed option to sterilize it completely. In this cleaning cycle, the temperatures actually go up to 95 degrees Celsius, disinfecting all the interiors by the heat itself. Chances of clothes getting contaminated by existing molds or bacteria are contained.

Baby care: A baby care program is very useful if there are baby clothes to be washed. This program is able to kill bacteria without damaging the quality of the baby clothes. This feature also ensures that no detergent residue remains on the clothes.

Extra rinse: The LG F1496ADP24 Six Motion Direct Drive Fully-automatic Front-loading Washing Machine has a four rinse cycle, which ensures that all detergent is removed from the clothes. The machine has a rinse hold action, which gives one the option of rinsing clothes for extra time, so as to ensure that no foul smell travels to the drier cycle.

Multi-set motion drives: This fully automatic washing machine from the house of LG is powered by six different types of motions. The machine is equipped with functions like swing, tumbling, filtration, rolling, scrubbing, rolling and stepping. These multiple functions pretty much take care of all kinds of washing needs. Due to these different motions the clothes come out much more cleaner, less tangled and with no damage done.

Review from dpreview.com

Product Description

Among semi-automatic top loading washing machines, the Godrej GWS 8502 PPL is one of the best value buys among its peers.

Allows manual intervention: The washing machine permits manual intervention, whenever required. It is gentle on clothes up for cleaning and does not make the job seem like a tiresome household chore. The machine is pretty compact but can take up a washing load of 8.5 kg capacity at one go.

Lint free washing: The Godrej GWS 8502 PPL has a lint collector attached inside the wash drum that gathers all the lint during a wash cycle and keeps clothes all lint free.

Three wash programs: For washing all types of clothes, the machine has three wash programs, it also has an active soak function that increases the wash time but is able to get rid of deep and stubborn stains.

A hexa-scrub option: This washing machine has a feature that combines a powerful pulsator action with a micro scrubber motion. The hexa-scrub mechanism deals with tough stains as and when clothes require extra cleaning.

Rust proof polypropylene body: The washing machine is cast in a strong polypropylene plastic body that is known to resist rust. This makes the product a very durable one that is likely to last for several years.

name: IFB 6.5 kg Fully-Automatic Front Loading Washing Machine (Senorita Aqua VX , White)
description:
• Front-loading washing machine
  • 6.5 kg capacity
  • 7 segment LED display
  • Warranty: 4 years comprehensive warranty on product
  • Temperature options: 95, 60, 40, 30 degree centigrade and cold, Door diameter: 320 millimeters, Door opening angle: 180 degree, Water supply: 03 Bar to 10 Bar
  • Laundry add option, 3D shower system, 4 digit large display, audio visual indication, program time and progress indication

Product description

Product Description

Are you looking for a washing machine that will treat all your different fabrics with the same care? A washing machine that effectively cleans all the garments without being harsh on the fabric? Then look no further, IFB brings you the Senorita Aqua VX Front-Loading Washing Machine that answers all your washing requirements.

Punch Swirling Toeredo Washing Technology for Effective Cleaning

Buying a washing machine can be a tricky job, considering all the factors that you need to keep in mind while choosing one. Sometimes you might find some good features in one washing machine and others in some other model, which makes your buying decision even more difficult. But with IFB, you no longer need to face any such dilemmas. The IFB Senorita Aqua VX comes with smart features that takes care of all the cleaning needs. Senorita Aqua VX employs the ‘punch swirling toeredo’ technology that uses water pressure to remove dirt and grease through the layers of your fabric. The water circulates through the entire drum, dissolving the detergent and washes the cloth properly without leaving any traces of dirt or detergent. Whether it is the delicate fabrics or coarse denim jackets and pants, the different modes like Easy Care and Quick Wash effectively cleans all of them alike.

Smart Features for a Better Result

Be it the digital dashboard or the ‘Aqua Energie’ option, the IFB Senorita Aqua VX is loaded with lots of cool features. Features like the ‘Laundry Add’ lets you add any piece of cloth that you might have missed while loading the machine, even after the wash cycle has started. The ‘Aqua Energie’ feature converts hard water to soft water by breaking down the bi-carbonates that might be present in the water. Soft water ensures a better cleaning and maintenance of the clothes. The ‘Tub Clean’ option automatically cleans the insides of the washing tub and helps to keep it odour-free and hygienic. Also, there is an ‘Auto Imbalance’ option which redistributes the load inside the drum if it was not properly placed in the first place. Choose all of these and more features with the IFB Senorita Aqua VX. Shop online at Amazon India and get huge discounts on this washing machine.

From the Manufacturer

Does your laundry consist of a variety of fabrics? The Smart Program function comprises Easy Care, Quick Wash, Wool, Delicates and more, which will help you tackle all. These programmes will help you tackle all the different types of fabrics at just the push of a button.

3D Shower System
This adds dynamic motion to the water and ensures that you get a cleaner and fresher wash for your clothes anytime. A special water system with nozzles, ensures 360°degree water circulation in the drum. The detergent completely dissolves and goes deeper into your clothes for a cleaner wash. During rinsing, fresh water penetrates deep into the clothes to wash off all traces of detergent. The clothes come out cleaner and fresher.

Crescent Moon Drum
The crescent moon shaped pattern on the inner drum protects clothes during the wash. Water curves up in a swoosh pattern and prevents the clothes from rubbing against the wall of the steel drum. Clothes get a gentle yet thorough cleaning.

Auto Imbalance System
If the washing machine senses the wash load is unevenly distributed, it will redistribute the load inside the drum to balance it and prevent it from toppling over. In this process, the washing machine will start and stop during rotation cycles as it balances the load.

Foam Control System
It automatically senses the generation of foam and activates a dilution system to dissolve the excessive foam. This helps maintain the wash quality.

Protective Rat Mesh
An additional cover at the bottom of the machine protects against possible damage to the machine caused by the entrance of rodents.

Aqua Energie
A special built in Aqua Energie filter converts hard water to soft water by breaking the bi-carbonates and reducing them to crystals. The filtered water is soft and facilitates wetting of clothes and proper dissolving of the detergent enzymes giving your clothes a proper wash. It also reduces scaling on machine components. These crystals are microscopically small and flow with the water instead of forming crusts. The filtered water is soft and facilitates wetting of clothes. The detergent enzymes dissolve in the water giving your clothes a better wash. It reduces scaling on machine components.

Tub Clean
Regular use of washing machine results in development of fungus and bacteria in the tub, which leads to bad odour. This feature eliminates any impurities, scaling, bacteria and unpleasant smell from the washing machine. Before selecting Tub Clean feature, empty the drum and add some amount of detergent or descalant.

Laundry Add
Missed out on your favourite shirt? This feature lets you pause add laundry even after wash cycle has started, giving you complete control of the wash.

name: LG F1296QD24 Front-loading Washing Machine (7 Kg, Luxury Silver)
description:
• Front-loading washing machine; 7 kg capacity
  • 2 years warranty on the product
  • 4 spin speed options (No spin/400/800/1200 RPM)
  • Door diameter: 300 millimeters; Door opening angle: 180 degree
  • More motion, better care, 6 motion DD, inverter control and tub clean

Product description

Product Description

Compare the amazing features available on LG front loading washing machines and find the one that’s right for you. With a variety of innovative features, such as 6 Motion technology and Direct Drive motors, LG provides more options for getting your clothes clean, while being gentle on even your most delicate fabrics. In addition to our range of front load washing machines, we also offer a host of other stylish, energy-efficient appliances. Available in a range of colours, you can create a look that complements your space beautifully.

From the Manufacturer

view larger
6 Motion DD

6 Motion Technology with 6 different types of motions- Agitating, Waveforce, Rotating, Compressing, Swing & Rubbing cycles, combines the force of water and the rhythm of motion to cater to all kinds of washing needs. Depending on the type of cloth & dirt level, clothes are washed changing the motions. It also provides you less damaged, less tangled and cleaner clothes.

view larger
Inverter Direct Drive Motor

In LG washing machine with Inverter Direct Drive Technology, the motor is directly attached to the drum without using a belt or pulley. Lesser mechanical parts ensures least energy dissipation which enhances the washing performance,ensures minimal noise and vibration,more durability and energy saving.

view larger
Inverter Control

Inverter Control System generates less speed fluctuations and consumes the exact amount of electricity needed at every step. This not only saves you water and energy but also ensures optimum washing performance.

Tub Clean

Constant use of the washing machine results in the development of fungus and toxic substances in the tub area of the ordinary washing machine. The Tub Clean function in the LG Steam Washer Dryer uses hot steam with high spin speed to sterilize every corner of the tub. The tub remains disinfected, & so do the clothes. LG Steam machine takes care of the clothes and also the health of its customers.

Baby Care

With the baby care feature the temperature reached upto 95 degree celsius, all enzymes & bacteria are removed,also the gentle motor takes care of the quality of the clothes.Also no detergent residue remains in the clothes.

Rinse Hold

After a rinse cycle, clothes stay suspended in the water without entering into the spin mode. The rinse hold cycle gives the option of an additional rinse cycle to release the rinse hold before entering the spin cycle. It prevents foul smell thereby maintaining the freshness of the clothes.

Pre Wash

The clothes are given a preliminary wash and dirty water is drained out to removes the toughest of the stains & dirt.

Product Description

This LG fully automatic machine packed with advanced laundry technology to ensure absolute pampering of your clothes. It has i-Sensor, a 7 sensor technology which determines the ideal wash pattern, giving you detergent residue free clothes. It has unique audio assistance which guides you through the entire washing cycle.

From the Manufacturer

Jet Spray

Jet Spray is a unique washing Technology which removes the detergent stains completely during rinse. During rinse when the tub spins quickly, water is sprayed forcefully on the clothes from top through nozzle. As a result , water penetrates in to the clothes removing all the detergent stains giving a perfect wash with efficient use of water

Turbo Drum

The unique technology that knows how to take care of your clothes while giving you the perfect wash. The dual direction rotating drum reduces tangling of clothes which ensures your clothes stay as fresh and new for much longer than ever before. The machine also is now less susceptible to wear and tear giving you a longer life. Turbodrum allows the movement of the drum in the opposite direction of the pulsator, for a doubly-efficient wash action.

Waterfall Circulation

Smart Filter

3-Step Wash

3 Step Washing makes the best washing performance with low tangling and is done in three steps. It gives the advantage of hand wash with best use of detergent.

Smart Clean

The purpose of this cycle is to optimize the detergent residue during washing and rinsing cycles. In order to implement this effect, the washer adds more rinsing times with the advanced i-Sensor. The clothes are residue and detergent free.

Air Dry

When the drum rotates the airdry system sucks in air, thereby throwing a blast of air on the clothes. Thus air dry system by removing moisture leaves clothes absolutely free from bad odour & bacteria and also facilitates faster drying of clothes.

This LG fully automatic machine packed with advanced laundry technology and features ensure absolute pampering of your clothes.

From the Manufacturer

Turbo Drum

The unique technology that knows how to take care of your clothes while giving you the perfect wash. The dual direction rotating drum reduces tangling of clothes which ensures your clothes stay as fresh and new for much longer than ever before. The machine also is now less susceptible to wear and tear giving you a longer life. The Sensor automatically detects detergent quantity to put by user, water temperature and water hardness so as to make best washing algorithm for washing and rinsing, ultimately giving best washing effect. To give a balanced wash, it is an intelligent sensor which would give the best wash cycle suiting the washing environment.

Fuzzy Logic Control

A built in load sensor automatically detects the laundry load and a microprocessor optimizes washing conditions such as ideal water level and washing time. You can set the Wash Program type at Fuzzy and it would sense the appropriate washing method required to give you the best washing performance.

Punch +3 Pulsator

Punch + 3 Pulsator propels detergent-rich water vertically into every thread of fabrics. The 3 mini-pulsator technology, generates powerful microcurrents which ensures better quality wash.

Air Dry

When the drum rotates the airdry system sucks in air, thereby throwing a blast of air on the clothes. Thus air dry system by removing moisture leaves clothes absolutely free from bad odour & bacteria and also facilitates faster drying of clothes.

3-Step Wash

3 Step Washing makes the best washing performance with low tangling and is done in three steps. It gives the advantage of hand wash with best use of detergent.

Stainless Steel Tub

Durable at the core the stainless steel tub in this machine is more durable than plastic, and repels stains and odors.

Aqua reserve

This one touch feature saves water and helps in reducing the water wastage. You can reuse the water left after a wash or rinse cycle.

description:
• Top-loading washing machine
  • Warranty: 2 years on product and 10 years on motor
  • Punch plus 3 pulsator, transparent window, 10 water level selection
  • Program: Fuzzy, wool, quick wash and blanket; Special program: Extra rinse, tub clean, silent and favorite; Temperature selection: Cold; Water inlet: Cold
  • Powerful washing with multi water flow, turbo drum, waterfall circulation and smart filter

Description for LG 6.2 kg Fully-Automatic Top Loading Washing Machine (T72CMG22P, Marine Blue /

Product Description

This LG washing machine deploys a unique waterfall circulation effect that provides better circulation of water along with evenly distributed strong washing currents. This allows the detergent to dissolve evenly in the water for an efficient wash cycle. During rinsing, the water gets to reach all the threads of the clothes, cleaning them of all the soap thoroughly.

Punch pulsator for a better quality wash: The Punch+3 Pulsator works by pushing the detergent-rich water deeper into each and every fibre of the clothes. The micro-currents generated by the three mini-pulsator technology give a better quality wash every time it is used.

Wash is done in three steps: This washing machine cleans up in three different steps that result in reduced tangling of the clothes along with an efficient yet economical wash.

Turbo drum technology: Thanks to the Turbo Drum Technology, the drum of the washing machine rotates in two directions that reduce the wear-and-tear of the clothes during a wash cycle. Besides, such a movement has the drum move about in opposite direction to the pulsator which makes for a rich wash every time.

Smart filter for hygienic wash: The washing machine comes with a smart Anti-bacterial Plastic Filter that is durable and extremely easy to use. This filter helps to maintain the hygiene of wash cycle.

Stainless steel odourless tub: This washing machine has got an innovative stainless steel tub instead of a plastic one. A metal tub not only increases the longevity of the machine but also keeps stains and bad odour at bay even after prolonged usage.

name: LG P9562R3S Semi-automatic Washing Machine (8.5 Kg, Dark Grey)
description:
• Semi-automatic washing machine; 8.5 kg capacity
  • 4 wash programs
  • Water Inlet: Cold; Wash Tub Capacity: 8.5 kilograms
  • Roller jet pulsator
  • Spin Tub Capacity: 6.5; Wash Timer: 15 minutes; Spin Motor: 260 watts; Spin Timer: 5 minutes; Wash Motor: 410 watts

Description for LG P9562R3S Semi-automatic Washing Machine (8.5 Kg, Dark Grey)

Product Description

A heavy duty value for money washing machine

A budget washing machine from the house of LG, this particular model is a semi-automatic one that showcases a top-load feature and can comfortably wash up 8.5 kg load capacity in one go.

Better quality of wash by adding friction to the clothes: The washing machine makes use of a jet roller pulsator that adds friction between the clothes, and cleans them thoroughly by removing dust, stains and mites, if any.

Different wash programs for different types of clothes: There are 3 wash programs to wash different types of clothes- Normal, Strong and Gentle. While Normal can be used for regular clothes, the Strong aids washing bed linens and other hard laundry while the Gentle Mode can be used for silks and woollens. Apart from these, there is another Soak option which lets the excessively dirty and scaled clothes soaked into detergent water while the machine automatically cleans them after the Soak period gets over.

Collar scrubber for efficient wash: The LG Washing Machine is equipped with a specialized Collar Scrubber that can scrubs cuffs and collars separately while washing.

Lint filter for better performance: There is a detachable lint filter within the drum of the washing machine that collects all the detached fibres from the clothes while washing, preventing them from reaching and blocking the pipes.

Wash, iron and get going: The wind jet dry feature of this machine dries the clothes in a jiffy, and makes them ready to iron and wear. It works by reducing the remaining moisture from the clothes and air drying them while spinning the tub.

Rat away technology keeps off the pests: The body of the washing machines by LG has a three mm strong and durable plastic cover that has special rat repellent chemical in it. This not only wards off rats but also keeps off other pets that could damage the washing machine.

From the Manufacturer

Rat Away Technology

LG puts technology to best use with its latest range of Semi-Automatic Washing Machines that come with Rat Away. LG washing machines have 3mm strong plastic cover with rat repellent chemical that ensures no harm is done to your machine in the presence of rats. Now you don't need to worry about rats damaging your washing machine by cutting the internal wires which in turn affect the durability & performance. Be assured and keep your washing machine wherever you like.

Roller Jet Pulsator

Product description

Product Description

This LG fully automatic machine packed with advanced laundry technology and features ensure absolute pampering of your clothes.

From the Manufacturer

Turbo Drum

The unique technology that knows how to take care of your clothes while giving you the perfect wash. The dual direction rotating drum reduces tangling of clothes which ensures your clothes stay as fresh and new for much longer than ever before. The machine also is now less susceptible to wear and tear giving you a longer life. Turbodrum allows the movement of the drum in the opposite direction of the pulsator, for a doubly-efficient wash action.

Punch +3 Pulsator

Punch + 3 Pulsator propels detergent-rich water vertically into every thread of fabrics. The 3 mini-pulsator technology, generates powerful microcurrents which ensures better quality wash.

3-Step Wash

3 Step Washing makes the best washing performance with low tangling and is done in three steps. It gives the advantage of hand wash with best use of detergent.

Stainless Steel Tub

Durable at the core the stainless steel tub in this machine is more durable than plastic, and repels stains and odors.

Product Description

Roller pulsator to clean clothes better: The washing machine features rollers that remove mites and dust by adding friction to the clothes resulting in better quality wash.

Magic wheels to allow swift movement: LG’s Semi Automatic Washing Machine comes with magic wheels that are rotatable around 360 degrees. This allows swift movement to the machine without any hassle.

3+1 wash programs for added efficiency: Along with the Normal wash mode, this machine packs in additional Gentle and Strong modes as well. This provides right amount of care to different types of clothes. Also, there is a Soak mode that helps to deep-clean stains and other harsh fibres with ease.

Detachable lint filter for better performance: There is also a detachable lint filter inside the drum of the washing machine that collects lose fibres, and prevents them from getting stuck in pipes that can disrupt the cleaning process.

Collar scrubber for added efficiency: This machine has a special feature that is able to scrub cuffs and collars efficiently during the wash cycle.

Wind jet dry for drying clothes in a jiffy: This feature brings fresh and ready-to-iron clothes in no time. It works by reducing the remaining moisture after a spin cycle from the clothes and there is hardly a need left for air-drying them after that.

Protective shield by rat away technology: The special feature of this washing machine is a three mm strong plastic cover with specialized rat repellent chemicals that keep rats and pests away. This allows the user to keep the washing machine in any place without having to worry about its longevity and performance.

description:
• Fully-automatic top-loading washing machine; 6.5 kg capacity
  • 2 years warranty
  • Gravity drum, cascade waterfall effect, digital control panel
  • Detergent mixer, twirl tech pulsator, dry tap protection
  • Tub clean, free soak, delay start, self shut

Description for Godrej WT EON 651 PFD Fully-automatic Top-loading Washing Machine (6.5 Kg, Metallic

Product Description

Introducing the new Godrej eon glitz washing machine with best in class features and alluring looks, this washing machine is a perfect blend of style as well as technology.

From the Manufacturer

view larger
view larger
view larger
view larger
Gravity Drum

The unique drum contour design ensures effective and efficient cloth movement inside the tub which leads to a four way wash and also provides a better scrubbing action. The gravity drum design is highly effective for dirt removal and consistent wash performance

Cascade Waterfall Effect

The new Godrej Eon Glitz Washing Machine comes with a unique washing action called the Cascade Effect. This acts like a waterfall which flows from both sides of the drum. The dirty water flows out as fresh water gushes in to take its place.

Digital Control Panel

The ergonomically designed inclined digital control panel lets the user seamlessly manage all operations of the machine with ease and lets the user keep a check on the status of the wash even from a distance.

Detergent Mixer

The Detergent Mixer with its inbuilt aqua-flow contours ensures uniform mixing of the detergent and leads to effective detergent utilisation. A uniform mixed and filtered water-detergent mix is then sent into the wash tub which gives a more effective wash and prevents detergent smudging on the clothes.


view larger
Aqua Jet Pulsator

The Aqua Jet Pulsator has a well-crafted, superior design. It’s forceful nature ensures that all the dirt and tough stains are removed. The Pulsator has a 360 degree motion and a 180 degree anti-clockwise motion which helps detangle and scrub your clothes.


view larger
Dry Tap Protection

This feature leads the machine to hibernate if the water flow ceases during the filling process. If the water level fails to rise for 15 minutes, the machine warns you with the help of flickering LEDs. You may then choose to manually fill water in the drum. The Dry Tap Protection feature also prevents the water inlet valve from burning out. Thus, it is aware and self-protecting in nature.


view larger
Tub Clean

It’s a self cleaning mechanism built in to the machine in which the machine runs itself to remove any residue left from the previous washes, hence keeps it clean.


view larger
Free Soak

Free soak automatically adds a soak of 30 mins to the current cycle and simultaneously updates the remaining time.


view larger
Delay Start

The delay start feature allows the user to set a delay in starting operation by upto 23 hours. This allow the wash take place even in your absence.


view larger
Self-Shut

Your Godrej Eon Glitz Washing Machine automatically switches off when the wash is over. It helps save water and electricity. It is perfect to cut costs and help the environment. Auto Shut strives to meet your thoughtful needs.


view larger
Save Settings

It allows you to save your most preferred wash cycle. The Save Settings feature helps you save precious time when you are too busy to overlook the functions of your machine. The machine is adept enough to complete the whole washing cycle without any supervision.


view larger
Schott Glass Window

After taking the evolving trends and customer insights into consideration, we partnered with renowned German glass manufacturers Schott, to manufacture a wide and curved toughened glass for the new Godrej Eon Glitz Washing Machine. The curvature adds to the machines affluent look and offers you with an option, as opposed to the commonly available flat toughened glass.


view larger
10 Program Levels

Godrej Eon Glitz Washing Machines with DAC Technology comes with 10 Programe Levels - Fuzzy, Daily Wash, Gentle, Sari, Jeans, Strong, Wool, Favourite, Quick Wash, Blanket. You have the option of choosing a wash program, which is best suited for the kind of fabric used.


view larger
Smart Rinse

This feature lets you add water during your wash cycles, which helps you remove as much detergent as possible. Smart Rinse is specially designed for baby apparel and for people with sensitive skin.


view larger
Soak Selector

This feature provides intensive care for your clothes, specially the heavily soiled clothes. The nine available options allow you to select the ideal soaking option for your wash.


view larger
++ Fuzzy

Godrej Eon Glitz Washing Machines are always working towards simplifying your experience. The fuzzy logic feature uses the washing machine’s microcomputer to determine the wash cycle and the water level according to the size and quality of your load. It lets you wash, rinse and spin-dry at the touch of a button.


view larger
DAC Technology

The Dynamic Aqua Power Control Technology automatically puts the washing machine in sleep mode, at the first detection of a water/ power cut. And it automatically starts to wash once the supply is efficient, enabling you to set your machine even when there is no water/ power supply!

Technical Specification
+ DACYes
Auto Balance SystemYes
Auto Power OFFYes

Delay StartYes (Upto 23hrs)

The Detergent Mixer with its inbuilt aqua-flow contours ensures uniform mixing of the detergent and leads to effective detergent utilisation. A uniform mixed and filtered water-detergent mix is then sent into the wash tub which gives a more effective wash and prevents detergent smudging on the clothes.


view larger
Aqua Jet Pulsator

The Aqua Jet Pulsator has a well-crafted, superior design. It’s forceful nature ensures that all the dirt and tough stains are removed. The Pulsator has a 360 degree motion and a 180 degree anti-clockwise motion which helps detangle and scrub your clothes.


view larger
Dry Tap Protection

This feature leads the machine to hibernate if the water flow ceases during the filling process. If the water level fails to rise for 15 minutes, the machine warns you with the help of flickering LEDs. You may then choose to manually fill water in the drum. The Dry Tap Protection feature also prevents the water inlet valve from burning out. Thus, it is aware and self-protecting in nature.


view larger
Tub Clean

It’s a self cleaning mechanism built in to the machine in which the machine runs itself to remove any residue left from the previous washes, hence keeps it clean.


view larger
Free Soak

Free soak automatically adds a soak of 30 mins to the current cycle and simultaneously updates the remaining time.


view larger
Delay Start

The delay start feature allows the user to set a delay in starting operation by upto 23 hours. This allow the wash take place even in your absence.


view larger
Self-Shut

Your Godrej Eon Glitz Washing Machine automatically switches off when the wash is over. It helps save water and electricity. It is perfect to cut costs and help the environment. Auto Shut strives to meet your thoughtful needs.


view larger
Save Settings

It allows you to save your most preferred wash cycle. The Save Settings feature helps you save precious time when you are too busy to overlook the functions of your machine. The machine is adept enough to complete the whole washing cycle without any supervision.


view larger
Schott Glass Window

After taking the evolving trends and customer insights into consideration, we partnered with renowned German glass manufacturers Schott, to manufacture a wide and curved toughened glass for the new Godrej Eon Glitz Washing Machine. The curvature adds to the machines affluent look and offers you with an option, as opposed to the commonly available flat toughened glass.


view larger
10 Program Levels

Godrej Eon Glitz Washing Machines with DAC Technology comes with 10 Programe Levels - Fuzzy, Daily Wash, Gentle, Sari, Jeans, Strong, Wool, Favourite, Quick Wash, Blanket. You have the option of choosing a wash program, which is best suited for the kind of fabric used.


view larger
Smart Rinse

This feature lets you add water during your wash cycles, which helps you remove as much detergent as possible. Smart Rinse is specially designed for baby apparel and for people with sensitive skin.


view larger
Soak Selector

This feature provides intensive care for your clothes, specially the heavily soiled clothes. The nine available options allow you to select the ideal soaking option for your wash.


view larger
++ Fuzzy

Godrej Eon Glitz Washing Machines are always working towards simplifying your experience. The fuzzy logic feature uses the washing machine’s microcomputer to determine the wash cycle and the water level according to the size and quality of your load. It lets you wash, rinse and spin-dry at the touch of a button.


view larger
DAC Technology

The Dynamic Aqua Power Control Technology automatically puts the washing machine in sleep mode, at the first detection of a water/ power cut. And it automatically starts to wash once the supply is efficient, enabling you to set your machine even when there is no water/ power supply!


view larger
Auto Balance System

This system stops the washing machine if it senses any imbalance in the wash load. It then automatically stabilises the load evenly across the drum and resumes washing. The Auto Balance system prevents the wear and tear of your clothes.

Product description

Product Description

Fully automatic machine with fuzzy logic.

From the Manufacturer


view larger
Force 4 Technology

Unlike most washing machines which offer a two-way wash action, Godrej's revolutionary Force 4 Technology provides a four-way action against dirt. A clockwise-anticlockwise movement of the pulsator is further enhanced with an up-down movement of the punch which generates a powerful four directional water force. This Force 4 Technology literally forces out the toughest dirt from the most difficult- to- clean areas, ensuring the cleanest wash.


view larger
Fuzzy Logic

The intelligent micro-computer controls all operations precisely to ensure a perfect wash. The machine is equipped with fuzzy load and quality sensing to determine the water level and wash cycle appropriate for the wash load. Washing, rinsing and spin drying happens with a single selection on the control panel.


view larger
Dry Tap Protection

If the water flow stops during the water filling process, the machine starts hibernating. If the water level shows no rise in level in the next 15 minutes the machine indicates by sounding beeps and flickering LEDs.
Advantages:

  • Protects the water inlet valve from burning out over time


view larger
Auto Restart With Memory Back-Up

Ensures that your program settings stay the way you had set them in case of a power failure. What's more, a buzzer informs you of the machine restarting

Other Features

  • 3 Wash Programs/ 3 Water Levels It provides the flexibility of choosing the right program from Regular, Synthetics & Heavy. Also allows one to select the right water level incase of non-fuzzy operation.

Product description

With 6.5 kg capacity, this semi-automatic washing machine from the house of Samsung can wash a bunch of jackets, bed linens, clothes, curtains, etc. At one go. The machine is easier to move around with its fairly big wheels and it does not require a permanent water connection.

Three distinct wash programs for added cleanliness: The washing machine supports three different wash programs-intensive, normal and delication. While the former is perfect for cleaning heavy laundry, the normal mode does a good job for regular clothes and laundries, and the delication mode cleans the delicate fabrics like silk and wool easily.

Integrated washboard for better washing: The machine makes use of integrated wash board which lets one easily scrub the collars, cuffs and other stubborn stains without much of a hassle.

Special lint filter: The special lint filter located inside the drum separates and collects lint, hair, and other loose fabric while washing to prevent them from settling on washed clothes or at the bottom and block the machines pipes.

Rust-proof body for better longevity: The washing machine is made of a unique material that resists moisture and prevents machine’s body from rusting. This ensures an elongated life to the product.

description:
• Front-loading Washing Machine; 6 kg capacity
  • 2 years warranty on the product
  • Features: Child lock
  • Wash programs: Cotton, only spin, baby care, rinse plus spin, synthetic and wool

Description for Samsung WF600B0BKWQ/TL Front-loading Washing Machine (6 Kg, White)

Product Description

Wash clothes with the Samsung 6 kg WF600B0BKWQ/TL front loading washing machine once and you wouldn't want to do it any other way. With a maximum spin speed of 1000 rpm, this washing machine ensures the clothes are thoroughly cleaned. Its A+++ energy rating makes it an energy efficient option. The Diamond Drum keeps your clothes looking good even after repeated washing.

This white Samsung front loading washing machine features ceramic heaters that prevent calcium compound build-up and also are more energy efficient. Its voltage control ensures that it works safely even when there are voltage fluctuations. Other features include digital inverter motor, Fuzzy Logic controls, Baby Care, Rinse Hold, Intensive Wash, Child Lock, door lock display, fault check display, Rinse+Spin, My Cycle, Quick Wash, Easy Iron and Eco Drum Clean.

From the Manufacturer

Durable and less energy

The digital inverter motor is brushless, so it runs much cooler — and uses less energy — than motors found in conventional washing machines. And because it has fewer moving parts, it also has a longer expected lifespan. That’s why Samsung can back the motor of our next-generation washing machines.

Designed to fit wherever you want

Whether you live in an apartment or a two-story house, get the most out of your space. The new Samsung Ecobubble washing machine comes in three depths — 550mm, 530mm and 450mm — so you can install it just about anywhere you want. Install one in a narrow laundry room, or if no such space exists, in your kitchen.

Smaller Holes for Better Fabric Care!

The streamlined shape of new Diamond Drum helps your clothes to wash softly by moving along the unique designed drum line. Also the small water exit holes prevent the fabrics from sticking out and consequently being damaged. Now you know even your most delicate clothes are being handled gently with upgraded diamond-shaped drum.

Long-lasting Quality
Samsung’s double coated ceramic heater protects itself from the build-up of water scale deposit, which ensures the heater will last at least up to ten years.

Consistent Power
Samsung Volt Control safeguards the washing machine from high levels of shock and even lower voltage, which protects life of the washing machine. Also this outstanding technology automatically restarts after power outages to protect your clothes as well.

Most Trusted Brand

Samsung India ranked number one in the Mobile Handsets/Tablets and Consumer Durables categories in the ‘Most Trusted Brands 2016’ annual survey, conducted by The Economic Times - Brand Equity and research firm Nielsen.

About Samsung

Samsung began its journey in India in 1995, and in over two decades, it has grown into one of the country’s biggest consumer product companies, with 2 factories, 3 R&D centres, 1 design centre, 1.5 lakh retail outlets and over 45,000 employees.

Samsung is pioneering local manufacturing through its ‘Make for India’ initiative.

Samsung has strengthened its commitment to provide quality customer service in both urban and rural India by augmenting its service network with 535 service vans. With this, the Samsung India service network has grown to over 3,000 from 2,000 service points earlier, extending its reach to customers in over 6,000 talukas across the country, making Samsung service network the largest in this industry in India. The service vans are equipped with multi skilled engineers, key components, DG sets and key jigs/fixtures for providing quick response and on-spot resolution.

name: Samsung WA90F5S4QTA/TL Top-loading Washing Machine (9 Kg, DA Silver)
description:
• Top-loading washing machine; 9 kg capacity
  • 2 years warranty on the product
  • Wobble Technology: A whole new spin on protecting delicate fabrics
  • The streamlined shape of the Diamond Drum provides a powerful yet gentle washing performance
  • Keep clothes magically lint-free

Product description

From the Manufacturer




Conventional washers claim to be gentle on your clothes, but the sleek W3050 washer takes fabric care to a new level. Samsung Wobble technology with dynamic water movement and Diamond Drum design reduce pulling forces and friction on clothes. That means your clothes tangle less and retain their shape longer. Digital Inverter Motor technology delivers long life, near-silent operation, and optimal energy efficiency. Beautiful, dependable, and gentle on all fabrics, the W3050 is designed to be a part of your home for life.




Wobble Technology: a whole new spin on protecting delicate fabrics
Samsung started from a clean sheet of paper to reimagine how a washer could be gentle on clothes while delivering outstanding cleaning performance. The W3050 uses innovative Wobble pulsators to generate multi-directional washing flow movement that moves water to all areas of your wash load. Wobble technology sets a new standard in fabric care and protection by reducing friction that causes garment-damaging tangles. It also enhances stain-fighting performance. Now you can experience increased cleaning power and treat your clothes to a higher level of delicate fabric care—all while using less water than “non-wobble” top-loading washers.




The W3050 is designed to be in harmony with your life. Its seamless round-edge contours and bright chrome accents put a beautiful face on power and efficiency. And thoughtful touches inside and out—including a larger, easier-to-fill detergent compartments, slanted Dual Cluster Control Panel and foldable tempered-glass door to make loading easy—take the work out of washing.

Diamond Drum
The streamlined shape of the Diamond Drum provides a powerful yet gentle washing performance. The diamond embossed drum gently moves clothes along the uniquely designed drum, while smaller water holes prevent fabrics from snagging and being damaged. Get fabric care with deep-clean results.

Keep clothes magically lint-free
The Samsung W3050 washer has the magic touch when it comes to making lint vanish. Magic Filter gets to the bottom of lint problems, working below the water line to trap lint and debris that conventional washers miss. And no other filter is as easy to clean. Magic Filter even has a convenient indicator light to tell you when to empty it—just like magic.

Air Turbo Drying System
Wet clothes and blankets take a long time to dry, especially when you’re line-drying in a humid climate. During the spin cycle, the Air Turbo Drying System rotates the drum rapidly, while dual air intakes draw in more air to extract more water from your clothes.

Eco Drum Clean
Wash the drum as easily as you clean your clothes by turning the dial to Eco Drum Clean. The cleaning cycle removes detergent residue and dirt buildup—without harsh chemicals. Not sure when to clean the tub? An alarm goes off after every 40 loads to remind you.

name: Samsung WA75H4000HP/TL Fully Automatic Top-Loading Free-Standing Washing Machine (7.5 Kg, Scarlet Red)
description:
• Fully-automatic top-loading washing machine; 7.5 kg capacity
  • 10 years warranty
  • Activwash+ is a unique dedicated space which gives you the freedom to pre-wash your delicate fabrics or hand-wash your heavily soiled clothes with utmost convenience at one place
  • Its built-in side water jet, which can be started and stopped at the push of a button, makes it extremely easy for you to get access to water anytime
  • Child lock

Description for Samsung WA75H4000HP Fully-automatic Top-loading Washing Machine (7.5 Kg, Scarlet

From the Manufacturer

Outstanding - All-in-one convenience

Delivers an exceptional level of convenience by uniting many essential features and advanced washing technologies in one machine. So washing, hand-washing and pre-washing are all simpler, safer and more effective.

Dedicated sink and water jet

The Samsung WA4500HH washing machine’s Activ Wash+ system includes a dedicated sink, which provides a convenient and unique space to hand-wash delicate items and pre-wash heavily soiled clothes. Especially as it includes a built-in water jet on the side, which can be started and stopped with the press of a button. And any water leftover can then be used for washing clothes in the drum below.

Advanced fabric care and cleaning

The Samsung WA4500HH washing machine’s innovative Wobble technology protects delicate fabrics from friction damage without compromising the washing performance. The unique structure of its Wobble pulsators generates a dynamic, multi-directional washing flow that prevents tangles, twists and knots and thoroughly cleans clothes. And its increased washing power also leads to less water consumption.

Easy opening, easy viewing

The Samsung WA4500HH washing machine’s lid is designed to open and close smoothly and silently, so there are no unexpected bangs! It also features a tempered glass window, so you can easily view your washing without lifting the lid. And it’s also extremely durable and resistant to scratches and damage, so it will last a long time.

Soft and gentle on clothes

The Samsung WA4500HH washing machine’s Diamond Drum features a unique design that treats clothes with more care than a conventional drum. Its smooth, diamond-shaped ridges are supremely gentle on even the most delicate items, while its small water exit holes also prevent fabric from becoming trapped and damaged. So your clothes stay looking good.

Easy and safe to control

The Samsung WA4500HH washing machine features a Rear Control Panel, which is located at the back of the machine. So it provides better visibility and ease of use, while also being protected from water splashes when you're hand and pre-washing. The panel’s dual cluster design also clearly separates the control buttons, so they’re much simpler to learn and intuitive to use.

Easily clean stubborn stains

The Samsung WA4500HH washing machine is equipped with a rubbing board. So it’s easier and more comfortable to pre-wash and scrub the heavily stained areas of clothes, like collars and cuffs, before starting a normal washing cycle.

Dedicated Sink
The dedicated sink provides a convenient and dedicated space to hand-wash delicate items and pre-wash heavily soiled clothes before quickly moving them into the drum below for a regular wash.

Water Jet
The dedicated sink has a built-in water jet on the side, so it's extremely easy to get water when you need to hand-wash clothes. Especially as it can be started and stopped with the press of a button.

Outstanding - All-in-one convenience

Delivers an exceptional level of convenience by uniting many essential features and advanced washing technologies in one machine. So washing, hand-washing and pre-washing are all simpler, safer and more effective.

Dedicated sink and water jet

The Samsung WA4500HH washing machine’s Activ Wash+ system includes a dedicated sink, which provides a convenient and unique space to hand-wash delicate items and pre-wash heavily soiled clothes. Especially as it includes a built-in water jet on the side, which can be started and stopped with the press of a button. And any water leftover can then be used for washing clothes in the drum below.

Advanced fabric care and cleaning

The Samsung WA4500HH washing machine’s innovative Wobble technology protects delicate fabrics from friction damage without compromising the washing performance. The unique structure of its Wobble pulsators generates a dynamic, multi-directional washing flow that prevents tangles, twists and knots and thoroughly cleans clothes. And its increased washing power also leads to less water consumption.

Easy opening, easy viewing

The Samsung WA4500HH washing machine’s lid is designed to open and close smoothly and silently, so there are no unexpected bangs! It also features a tempered glass window, so you can easily view your washing without lifting the lid. And it’s also extremely durable and resistant to scratches and damage, so it will last a long time.

Soft and gentle on clothes

The Samsung WA4500HH washing machine’s Diamond Drum features a unique design that treats clothes with more care than a conventional drum. Its smooth, diamond-shaped ridges are supremely gentle on even the most delicate items, while its small water exit holes also prevent fabric from becoming trapped and damaged. So your clothes stay looking good.

Easy and safe to control

The Samsung WA4500HH washing machine features a Rear Control Panel, which is located at the back of the machine. So it provides better visibility and ease of use, while also being protected from water splashes when you're hand and pre-washing. The panel’s dual cluster design also clearly separates the control buttons, so they’re much simpler to learn and intuitive to use.

Easily clean stubborn stains

The Samsung WA4500HH washing machine is equipped with a rubbing board. So it’s easier and more comfortable to pre-wash and scrub the heavily stained areas of clothes, like collars and cuffs, before starting a normal washing cycle.

Dedicated Sink
The dedicated sink provides a convenient and dedicated space to hand-wash delicate items and pre-wash heavily soiled clothes before quickly moving them into the drum below for a regular wash.

Water Jet

Product description

Product Description

Water Saving Washing Machine This Samsung WA62H4200HY/TL fully automatic washing machine comes with a 6.2 kg capacity and a 3D dynamic wash mode to ensure efficient cleaning. Its fully automatic nature makes it ideal for households with working professionals as it helps save ample time and energy by automating most of the processes. This top-loading washing machine comes with a two-year warranty. Wobble technology In order to aid water conservation, Samsung has equipped this washing machine with wobbling technology. The wobbling technology provides a three dimensional current of water to the clothes being washed which aids the cleaning process and at the same time also conserves water. It also helps to treat delicate clothes with sensitivity.

Tangle Free Technology: The tangle free technology has been devised by Samsung to ensure that the clothes are washed as spate entities and when you pull them out of the washing machine, they are still single pieces instead of having getting tangled with some other clothes. The technology uses a high yaw rate for the purpose and makes sure that the clothes thus revolve in the drum as individual entities.

Diamond Drums: The machine comes equipped with diamond drums which doesn’t allow the clothes to get caught in their holes thus keeping them safe and in turn saving time and effort as well.

Air turbo drying: The machine contains a powerful motor which rapidly rotates the drum of the machine so that the drying time can be substantially reduced.

name: Whirlpool 360 Bloomwash Fully-automatic Washing Machine (8 Kg, Silver)
description:
• Fully-automatic washing machine; 8 kg capacity
  • 2 years warranty on the product
  • 8 wash programs; 5 water level
  • 6th sense technology tumble care, hot catalytic soak, H2 low shower, inbuilt heater, variator wash system, dynamic soak and buzzer
  • Transparent spin window, detergent dispenser, delay start, auto re-start, wool cycle, low spin and auto tub clean and water re-use

Product description

From the Manufacturer

Inbuilt heater
It helps proper enzyme release from detergents by heating water to an optimum level to remove stubborn stains and provide a germ-free and odour-free wash.

Variator Wash System
The Whirlpool 360⁰ Bloomwash comes with the revolutionary Variator plate that washes clothes in multiple inside-out circles in a motion similar to that of a blooming flower. The clothes rub against each other as they get washed in Bloom motion. This ensures that the wash action cleans every part of the fabric, even parts other m=washing machines can never reach.



Catalytic Soak
The whirlpool 360 bloom wash uses 1/3 the water in comparison to another automatic washing machine,therefore using detergent far more effectively. Apart from using less water that makes the detergent act more effectively is the in built heater. The heater helps create a hot detergent solution in which the clothes are soaked before the wash action begins. This maximizes the detergent efficiency and ensure an excellent wash for soiled clothes.

H2LOW Shower
The whirlpool 360 bloom wash use a strong hydro-shower to loosen the dirt particles . During the wash. It sprays he clothes with detergent water that penetrates through every corner of the fabric and during the rinse.it sprays clean water on the fabric to ensure complete detergent removal.

6th Sense Technology Tumble Care
The Whirlpool 360 Bloomwash comes with the intuitive 6th Sense TumbleCare Technology that actually senses the laundry conditions & automatically moves clothes in a unique 360o Tumble Motion, ensuring every corner of the fabric is thoroughly & gently cleaned. It also activates the detergent by making the water reach its optimum temperature thanks to the In-built heater.

From the Manufacturer

Stylish aesthetics and Ease of Use
Smooth edges, curvaceous body and a convenient work station to sort and stack clothes at one place. Washing was never so stylish and convenient.

Ace Wash station: Multi utility tray
The innovative tray helps you sort clothes at the time of wash and carry them when they dry giving you great assistance in making washing a hassle free chore.

Ace Wash station: Work surface
The work surface is a convenient platform to sort and scrub clothes before you put them to wash. It provides a great utility to you in terms of space Utilization so that you spend less time on washing and more with your family.

Impeller
The impeller provides a perfect motion for the clothes as they are washed thus removing dirt effectively and keeping the clothes as new as ever.

Max Dry

3 wash programs

Short Control Panel

Big Wheels
Whirlpool ace comes fitted with a big wheels so that you can easily move the machine around making it more robust and stable.

Multi Utility Tray
This tray helps you short and carry dry clothes. It also has special pores through which the water seeps back into the tub. It can take up 30kgs.

Extendable Spin Lid
Simply open the spin lid and its converts into an additional space on the machine where you can stake all you washing accessories. It can take up 1kg load.

In-Built Scrubber
The special scrubber in the wash tub gives your clothes a perfect wash every time.

Max Dry
With the specially designed vents on the spin lid. You will be able to dry your clothes faster.

Product description

Product Description

Whirpool top loading washing machine adapts, senses and carries out the wash entirely, leaving you to enjoy your day. Now doing your laundry is as easy as 1-2-3. With the incredible intuitive 6th sense 123 wash technology you can get the cleanest wash in just 3 easy steps. The new spa wash system delivers the whitest white wash with the newly designed prime mover and drum combination along with 40 percent less tangling. It contains 50 percent lesser perforated holes than an ordinary wash drum, giving a smoother wash to your clothes and greatly reducing the amount of lint generated during wash.

From the Manufacturer

6th Sense 123 Wash Technology

Now doing your laundry is as easy as 1-2-3. With the incredible intuitive 6th SENSE 123 Wash Technology you can get the cleanest wash in just 3 easy steps. The machine adapts, senses and carries out the wash entirely, leaving you to enjoy your day.

Spa Wash System

The new SPA wash system delivers the whitest white wash with the newly designed prime mover and drum combination along with 40% less tangling. It contains 50% lesser perforated holes than an ordinary wash drum, giving a smoother wash to your clothes and greatly reducing the amount of lint generated during wash.

Easytech

Easytech- Smart diagnostics-Senses the voltage levels and water pressure in the tap;Detergent savings-Senses the load and fabric type and gives the detergent dosage required ;Automatic removal of lint -After every wash, wash gushes through the lint filter removing the lint accumulated during wash.

Easy To Use Control Panel

The easy to use control panel is built by keeping in mind your convenience which lets you have a hassle free wash experience.

ZPF Technology

ZPF technology - Fills tub 50% faster even when the water pressure is low as 0.017MPa

  • Fastest drum fill time of 5minutes
  • Works even if the height between the tank and tap is as low as 7 ft
8 Wash Programs

It gives user convinience to wash different types of load as per fabric type.

name: Godrej WT650CF Fully-automatic Top-loading Washing Machine (6.5 Kg, Red)
description:
• Fully-automatic top-loading washing machine; 6.5 kg capacity
  • 2 years warranty
  • Temperature Selection: Cold; Technology: Pulsator
  • Stainless steel inner tub; Cold water inlet
  • Customised water level selection

Product description

From the Manufacturer


view larger
Fuzzy Logic

Senses the quantity and quality of wash load to determine the water level and wash cycle appropriate for the wash load.
Advantages:

  • Truly Automatic Washing Machine
  • Washing, rinsing and spin drying happens with a single selection on the control panel.
  • Makes washing truly automatic.


view larger
Save Settings

Before the start of the entire wash cycle, press this button so that as the various processes take place, the machine keeps saving them in memory as the Favourite Program
Advantages:

  • One Touch Start
    - One can define and save his/her own program using Save Settings function as Favourite Program
    - Greater Convenience to you since they don't need to select the entire process again
    - Truly One Touch Start


view larger
Water Optimizer

This customized water level selector allows you to add some 'Extra' water at any selected water level.
Advantages:

  • Unlimited water levels
    - Allows you to select any water level between the 4 pre-set levels
  • Optimum Use Of Water
    - The most efficient wash uses only enough water to cover the clothes. 'Extra' water option allows you to use only as much water as required. Thus helps in saving water by making optimum use of it.


view larger
Dry Tap Protection

If the water flow stops during the water filling process, the machine starts hibernating. If the water level shows no rise in level in the next 15 minutes the machine indicates by flickering LEDs.
Advantages:

  • Protects the water inlet valve from burning out over time


view larger
Auto Restart With Memory Back-Up

Ensures that your program settings stay the way you had set them in case of a power failure.
Advantages:

  • Don't need to restart the process from the beginning when the power supply resumes
  • Need not manually restart. The machine resumes on its own


view larger
Auto Balance System

If there is an imbalance in the wash load, the machine automatically stops, tries to redistribute the load evenly and resumes washing
Advantages:

  • You can continue your work, without worrying about the machine stopping because of uneven load

From the Manufacturer


Tangle Free

Conventional washing machine causes 5 tangled laundries out of 18 laundries. However, Samsung's Wobble technology causes only one tangled laundry or not at all. Innovative Wobble Technology expresses the tangle-free, knot-free, and twists-free. Improved 80% untangling function compared to existing laundry releases your stress. All the data in Print AD comes from the comparison test between WA90BW 7Kg Best (Samsung New) and WA90VPBETH (Samsung Conventional) in Samsung Internal Lab. Disclaimer : Samsung’s Wobble technology "uses a wobble pulsator that makes a vertical current, enabling to be tangle-free. This was proved by Samsung's experiment when the new model WA908W 7Kg Best which uses Wobble technology" was compared to our conventional WA90VPBETH, showing improvement in the reduction of tangling. This means when 13 clothes are washed, the previous model would have 3 clothes tangled when the new model have only one half clothes. Tangling might occur depending on the washing circumstances.



Wobble technology

Unique structure of Wobble pulsator, Samsung's innovative technology invented, created left and right, upper and lower flow, then it caused 3D Dynamic Wash.



Wobble Pulsator

New record produced by the new heart. Samsung has produced innovative Wobble pulsator, and it gives you more satisfaction than previous laundry.



Practically dry, straight from the washer

In the Air Turbo Drying System powerful motor rapidly rotates the washing machine drum to pull more water out of the load and reduce drying time. With the combination of air intake and turbo power, choosing a Samsung washing machine has never been easier.



Keep clothes looking new with Diamond Drum

The uniquely designed holes of drum are deeply embossed in diamond shape that creates the perfect environment for gentle but effective washing of clothes. Fabric don’t catch in the cubic drum and are subsequently not damaged.



Water Saving!

A 3D Dynamic Wash made by Samsung's Wobble technology can increase the washing power, and save the 30% of water to remove dirt and pollution of water.The perfect washing power approved by the world should save water.

  • Unlike many other front loaders ours can be installed with both hot and cold water inlets

Product description

Quick smart front loader utilises our smart drive technology to eliminate the belt drive, delivering the ultimate clothes care. Using our direct drive motor this washer is whisper quiet. A revolutionary Vortex wash gets clothes cleaner faster. In fact the majority of the 9 cycles when set to wash at a temperature 30°c or lower will complete the cycle in well under an hour. Fisher & Paykel smart drive washing machines use our world first direct drive technology, which has revolutionised clothes washing and clothes care since the 1990s. By combining smart electronics and a direct drive motor that connects directly to the wash drum, the need for a belt and pulleys is removed and the motor constantly provides feedback to a computer controlling the tumble and spin action. This two way communication allows smart drive washers to sense and respond to each load in an intelligent way providing exceptional clothes care.

description:
• Semi-automatic top-loading washing machine; 7 kg capacity
  • 3 wash programs
  • Rat away technology: LG puts technology to best use with its latest range of semi-automatic washing machines that come with rat away
  • The rollers causes added friction to the clothes, removing dust and mites
  • The machine has 3 different wash programs ensuring a safe and customized wash for every fabric type

Product description

Product Description

Ensure complete care of your clothes and peace of mind with this machine.The plastic body ensures it is durable and is also shock and rust proof. The roller jet pulsator causes added friction to the clothes, removing dust and mites, giving you better quality wash.

From the Manufacturer

Rat Away Technology

LG puts technology to best use with its latest range of Semi-Automatic Washing Machines that come with Rat Away. LG washing machines have 3mm strong plastic cover with rat repellent chemical that ensures no harm is done to your machine in the presence of rats. Now you don't need to worry about rats damaging your washing machine by cutting the internal wires which in turn affect the durability & performance. Be assured and keep your washing machine wherever you like.

Roller Jet Pulsator

The rollers causes added friction to the clothes, removing dust & mites. This results in a better quality wash.

Wind Jet Dry

Wind Jet Dry so fresh, ready to Iron and wear

  • Reduce remainning moisture inside of washing machine and on the laundry.
  • By tub spinning, air comes into the tub and is circulated which removes water.
  • Circulation of air through air vents dries washing tub after finishing washing program in a short time
  • To keep inner tub from getting moldy caused by remaining moisture

3 Wash Programs
The machine has 3 different wash programs ensuring a safe and customized wash for every fabric type.

Electro Mechanical Control
Electro Mechanical Control

Lint Filter (Detachable)
The lint filter collects the fibres which come out while washing clothes. The fibres thus do not get stuck in the pipe, this giving a better washing performance

Collar Scrubber
Its unique collar scrubber helps you scrub cuffs and collars, saving your time and efforts.

description:
• Fully-automatic top-loading washing machine; 6.5 kg capacity
  • 12 wash programs
  • 2 years warranty on product
  • This washing machine comes with 6th Sense 1-2-3 wash technology that gets you the cleanest wash in just a manner of three simple steps
  • The whirlpool WM royale comes with a new spa wash system that delivers the whitest wash

Product description

Color:Grey

Washing Machine With 6th Sense Technology Whirlpool offers sixth sense technology to provide you with clothes which give the word ‘clean’ a whole new dimension. WM Royale 6512SD is a fully automatic washing machine, which guarantees seamless washing in just three easy steps. WM Royale 6512SD is like a robot because this machine adapts, carries and even senses out the entire wash. High Tech Wash Programs The effective and consistent cleaning process has been made possible because WM Royale can sense the amount of detergent and water required per wash making sure that you don’t overuse or waste either. The ‘Spa wash’ feature in the mode has been integrated to boost cleaning of white clothes. The washing machine comes with a drum and prime mover combination resulting in forty percent less tangling. You can get a smooth wash minus the hassle that goes along with conventional washing machines. Other Features WM Royale 6512SD plays host to numerous advanced features like fully automatic, buzzer, self clean, bleach inlet, child lock, stainless steel tub, water level select option, auto restart, etc. Its newly designed pads are tailor made for Indian climate. Royale has an express feature as well. The clothes will be wrinkle-free which are easier to iron further saving time and effort. There is an auto tub clean feature that removes toxins and fungus created at the surface of the tub. It does this by using steam along with high spin to sanitize all the parts. There’s also a child lock feature which allows you to secure your machine if you have kids around. It comes with a 6.5 kg capacity. Better Quality Wash Feature WM Royale 6512SD ensures you with a better quality wash with its high-tech features reducing your washing time as well as efforts. With this model, you can choose from a wide range of washing programs such as delicate, heavy, daily, sari, bedding, denim, spin only, wash + rinse, woollens and Aquastor. Chrome grey colour adds a new dimension to its looks. Cleaning clothes was never this easy and convenient. Flexible installation facility Once you buy the product from Amazon India you can call Whirlpool support on 18601804558 directly for installation. Don’t forget to mention the model name of the ac unit to the support as they’ll be at your home with the exact tools to make the installation process easily achievable.

name: Godrej 6.2 kg Fully-Automatic Top Loading Washing Machine (WT 620 CFS, Graphite Gray)
description:
• Fully-automatic top-loading washing machine
  • 6.2 kg capacity
  • If the water level shows no rise in level in the next 15 minutes the machine indicates by sounding beeps and flickering LEDs
  • Warranty: 2 years comprehensive warranty on product
  • The intelligent micro-computer controls all operations precisely to ensure a perfect wash
  • Ensures that your program settings stay the way you had set them in case of a power failure

Description for Godrej WT 620 CFS Fully-automatic Washing Machine

Color:Grey

Product Description

Unlike most washing machines which offer a two-way wash action, Godrej's revolutionary force 4 technology provides a four-way action against dirt. A clockwise-anticlockwise movement of the pulsator is further enhanced with an up-down movement of the punch which generates a powerful four directional water force. This Force 4 Technology literally forces out the toughest dirt from the most difficult- to- clean areas, ensuring the cleanest wash. If the water flow stops during the water filling process, the machine starts hibernating. If the water level shows no rise in level in the next 15 minutes the machine indicates by sounding beeps and flickering LEDs. Advantage: Protects the water inlet valve from burning out over time. The intelligent micro-computer controls all operations precisely to ensure a perfect wash. The machine is equipped with fuzzy load and quality sensing to determine the water level and wash cycle appropriate for the wash load. Washing, rinsing and spin drying happens with a single selection on the control panel. Ensures that your program settings stay the way you had set them in case of a power failure. What's more, a buzzer informs you of the machine restarting.

Review from dpreview.com
