name: LG Six Motion Direct Drive Fully-automatic Front-loading Washing Machine (5.5 Kg, Blue White)
description:
• Six motion direct drive fully-automatic front-loading washing machine; 5.5 kg capacity
  • 6 wash programs; 4 spin speed
  • 2 years warranty on the product
  • After a rinse cycle, clothes stay suspended in the water without entering into the spin mode
  • Get express wash for lightly soiled clothes with the wash, rinse and spin cycle, all in 30 mins

Product description

Product Description

This LG washer with its advanced fuzzy logic technology senses the wash environment and adjusts the wash cycle to give your clothes the perfect wash. The 300mm portable and 180 degree door opening angle allows you to conveniently handle bulky wash loads. With baby care you can ensure the most hygienic wash for your child's clothes. The unique LG direct drive motor ensures minimal noise and vibration, more durability and energy saving.

From the Manufacturer

6 Motion DD
6 Motion Technology with 6 different types of motions- Scrubbing, Rolling, Stepping, Swing,Tumbling and Filtration, combines the force of water and the rhythm of motion to cater to all kinds of washing needs. Depending on the type of cloth & dirt level, clothes are washed changing the motions. It also provides you less damaged, less tangled and cleaner clothes.

INVERTER DIRECT DRIVE TECHNOLOGY
In LG washing machine with Inverter Direct Drive Technology, the motor is directly attached to the drum without using a belt or pulley. Lesser mechanical parts ensures least energy dissipation which enhances the washing performance,ensures minimal noise and vibration,more durability and energy saving.

Smart Diagnosis
At some point in your washer’s life it will need some love and care. We just made the service easier and smarter for you. Now there is no need to wait for an engineer to detect a problem. Just dial smart diagnosis and wait for the telephone to tell you what to do or for a single visit by the service engineer with the solution. This removes the hassles of explaining your problem and saves cost & time.

Rinse Hold
After a rinse cycle, clothes stay suspended in the water without entering into the spin mode. The rinse hold cycle gives the option of an additional rinse cycle to release the rinse hold before entering the spin cycle. It prevents foul smell thereby maintaining the freshness of the clothes.

Baby Care
Jet Spray is a unique washing Technology which removes the detergent stains completely during rinse. With the baby care feature the temperature reached upto 95 degree celsius, all enzymes & bacteria are removed,also the gentle motor takes care of the quality of the clothes.Also no detergent residue remains in the clothes.

Durable Heater
Because of Durable Heater, there are less problems, therefore the LG Washer with Durable Heater maintains its performance even longer.

Time Delay
Time delay is an option that allows you to load the washing machine and have it start at a time according to your electricity and water availability at a later time. The maximum time delay is 19 hours.

Pre Wash
The clothes are given a preliminary wash and dirty water is drained out to removes the toughest of the stains & dirt.

Quick 30
Get express wash for lightly soiled clothes with the wash, rinse and spin cycle, all in 30 mins.

Product description

Product Description

An ideal washing machine from LG LG P7556R3FA Semi-automatic Top-loading Washing Machine is ideal for the Indian households. It comes in a rich blue colour which makes it a stylish addition to your house. Its capacity of 6.5 kg is ideal for an average Indian family. It comes loaded with many features Main Features This washing machine by LG uses the rat away technology to tackle the problem of rat and mice attack. The washing machine uses a roller to wash clothes. The roller manages to scrub off the dust and mites from the clothes without affecting the finesse of the fabric thus cleaning them better. The washing machine further uses the wind jet dry technology to dry the clothes. This technology works in a super fast manner and dries out the washed clothes in a very little time. In order to ensure that loose threads of the cloths do not stay suspended in the water, the device is equipped with a lint collector which collects the threads of the clothes. Some other features The machine comes with a collar scrubber which can help the user to achieve the scrub-wash effect on collars which is otherwise only achieved in the hand washing technique. The machine comes with a 3 wash programs which allows us to choose the customized program as per the fabric of the cloth, therefore ensuring a safe wash for the cloth. LG provides 2 years warranty on the product.

Durable and designed to last, this dryer features four dryer arms which extend and retract to accommodate multiple types of equipment. name: LG T10RRF21V1 Fully-automatic Top-loading Washing Machine (9 Kg,Dark Red)
description:
• Top-loading washing machine; 9 kg capacity
  • 10 water level selection
  • Powerful washing with multi water flow
  • Turbo drum
  • Waterfall circulation

Product description

Product Description

With ingenious features like our dual-action turbo drum and smart i-sensor technology, LG top loading washing machines are kinder on both your fabrics and your utility bills. Available in a range of capacities and colours, our sleek, sophisticated washers offer advanced functions and style to spare.

From the Manufacturer

Turbo Drum

The unique technology that knows how to take care of your clothes while giving you the perfect wash. The dual direction rotating drum reduces tangling of clothes which ensures your clothes stay as fresh and new for much longer than ever before. The machine also is now less susceptible to wear and tear giving you a longer life. Turbodrum allows the movement of the drum in the opposite direction of the pulsator, for a doubly-efficient wash action.

Waterfall Circulation

Improve rinsing effect, Provide circulation of water, various and evenly strong washing currents.

Smart Filter

Anti-Bacteria Plastic Filter (Market Best)
  • Durable
  • Easy to use
  • Hygienic (Anti-Bacteria)
  • Nice & Compact design
I-sensor

The Sensor automatically detects detergent quantity to put by user, water temperature and water hardness so as to make best washing algorithm for washing and rinsing, ultimately giving best washing effect. To give a balanced wash, it is an intelligent sensor which would give the best wash cycle suiting the washing environment.

Fuzzy Logic Control

A built in load sensor automatically detects the laundry load and a microprocessor optimizes washing conditions such as ideal water level and washing time. You can set the Wash Program type at Fuzzy and it would sense the appropriate washing method required to give you the best washing performance.

Punch +3 Pulsator

Punch + 3 Pulsator propels detergent-rich water vertically into every thread of fabrics. The 3 mini-pulsator technology, generates powerful microcurrents which ensures better quality wash.

Speech Technology

A hi-tech voice module guides user through entire washing process, gives demo and safety guidelines and also alerts you in case of any operating errors. This is available in two languages : Hindi and English. A machine that not just talks but also makes washing an overall fun filled experience.

Air Dry

When the drum rotates the airdry system sucks in air, thereby throwing a blast of air on the clothes. Thus air dry system by removing moisture leaves clothes absolutely free from bad odour & bacteria and also facilitates faster drying of clothes.

3-Step Wash

3 Step Washing makes the best washing performance with low tangling and is done in three steps. It gives the advantage of hand wash with best use of detergent.

From the Manufacturer

Smart Diagnosis

At some point in your washer’s life it will need some love and care. We just made the service easier and smarter for you. Now there is no need to wait for an engineer to detect a problem. Product description

Roller pulsator to clean clothes better: The washing machine features rollers that remove mites and dust by adding friction to the clothes resulting in better quality wash.

Magic wheels to allow swift movement: LG’s Semi Automatic Washing Machine comes with magic wheels that are rotatable around 360 degrees. This allows swift movement to the machine without any hassle.

3+1 wash programs for added efficiency: Along with the Normal wash mode, this machine packs in additional Gentle and Strong modes as well. This provides right amount of care to different types of clothes. Also, there is a Soak mode that helps to deep-clean stains and other harsh fibres with ease.

Detachable lint filter for better performance: There is also a detachable lint filter inside the drum of the washing machine that collects lose fibres, and prevents them from getting stuck in pipes that can disrupt the cleaning process.

Collar scrubber for added efficiency: This machine has a special feature that is able to scrub cuffs and collars efficiently during the wash cycle.

Wind jet dry for drying clothes in a jiffy: This feature brings fresh and ready-to-iron clothes in no time. It works by reducing the remaining moisture after a spin cycle from the clothes and there is hardly a need left for air-drying them after that.

Protective shield by rat away technology: The special feature of this washing machine is a three mm strong plastic cover with specialized rat repellent chemicals that keep rats and pests away. This allows the user to keep the washing machine in any place without having to worry about its longevity and performance.

Product description

Product Description

The Whirlpool Ace 7.5 Turbo Dry Semi-automatic Top-loading Washing Machine (7.5 kg, Peppy Purple) is a very effective home appliance that keeps your clothes fresh and clean. This semi-automatic washing machine uses powerful washing technology to remove stains and dirt that other machines fail to eliminate. The unique feature of turbo dry is useful when time is of the essence and the twin tubs help enhancing your laundry experience. This appliance comes with a two-year warranty. The super soak system and ace wash station enhance its results while compact size and big wheels at bottom provide comfortable usage. Convenient design, spin window and simple control panel The makers of the Whirlpool Ace 7.5 Turbo Dry Semi-automatic Top-loading Washing Machine (7.5 kg, Peppy Purple) have taken care to ensure that operating and using this home appliance is very easy and comfortable. This washing machine comes with big wheels and a smart handle that provides better grip and is useful while moving this machine. The spin window provides ideal view of spinning process and allows you to keep an eye on clothes when they get washed while the convenient control panel makes it very easy to operate the machine and manoeuvre the settings. Ace wash station and multi-utility tray This semi-automatic washing machine is armed with the feature of ace wash station that enables you to sort, stack and carry your clothes with ease. Plus, there is the multi-utility tray which is sturdy enough to carry as much as 30 kg of weight can be used to sort and carry clothes. Turbo dry, lint filter and buzzer The feature of turbo dry gives maximum dryness for washed clothes while the lint filter eliminates lint from clothes. The buzzer gives a reminder when the clothes get ready after the wash cycle. Super soak feature for extra care and Auto restart function Some clothes are very dirty and require special treatment for complete dirt removal. This washing machine has the super soak feature that allows you to soak your dirty laundry for some time in the detergent solution before the actual washing program helping the detergent to penetrate deeper in the cloth fibre. Moreover, the feature of Auto Restart is useful when there is power cut. This feature ensures your washing settings stay the same even during power cuts and hence you don’t have to restart the wash program from beginning when power resumes. Product Description

Smart and Chic Washing Machine The Whirlpool ACE 7.0 SUPER SOAK Semi Automatic Washing Machine is a useful appliance which takes care of your laundry needs in an efficient manner. The white and coral design comes with an attractive flower motif which adds to its appearance. It weighs 26 kg and is 79.3 cm in width, 48.5 cm in depth and 95.6 cm in height. Despite its weight, it is quite easy to move around thanks to the thoughtfully designed handle and large wheels which allow easy mobility. Built with high fibre, the body of the machine is rust-proof and robust. This is a top-loading machine which comes with a multi utility tray on top. Moreover, the machine comes with a two-year warranty. Super cleaning with Super Soak The Super Soak Technology resolves the problem of manual scrubbing and simplifies the cleaning of stubborn stains and spots. The machine soaks the clothes for 25 minutes in soap solution and then thoroughly scrubs them with two round shaped brushes. Versatile and efficient There are three washing programs, which means there is option to choose different types of cleaning methods for different types of clothes. While one kind of fabric may require longer cleaning, soaking and scrubbing, others may require tender handling. So, all types of clothes can be washed in this machine without any hassle. Also, washing is done by the impeller method which is quite effective in removing tough stains. Power Utility This machine is known for an optimum utilization of electricity. It consumes only 350 W, which means it will not sore up the monthly electricity bills. The power consumption of the washing machine is quite low yet the performance is consistent and uniform. More Features An important feature which makes the working of this machine trouble-free is the lint filter. This lint filter catches the fluff and stray fibres from the clothes and prevents clogging of the different channels and the drain pipe of the machine. The ACE Wash Station is a smart addition which allows stacking, sort and carrying the clothes.

Description for Whirlpool Ace 8.2 Turbo Dry Semi-automatic Top-loading Washing Machine (8.2 kg,

Product Description

High Performance Washing Machine The Whirlpool Ace 8.2 Turbo Dry Semi-automatic Top-loading Washing Machine is an innovative product from the house of Whirlpool. It is powered by a strong motor which can achieve a speed up to 1450 rpm. It is 8.2 kgs in capacity and can effectively fulfill laundry needs of an average-sized family. Its outer body is made of high quality plastic which protects the body from rust, while the inner frame is made of steel making it very durable. It has two chambers, one for washing and the other for drying. It sports a transparent lid which adds to the utility and the looks of the machine. The washing machine comes with a two-year warranty tag. Advanced technology This washing machine is equipped with multiple technologies which have been developed and patented by Whirlpool. Super Soak technology starts working from the first step as it soaks the clothes for 25 minutes in the detergent and water solution, followed by regular scrubbing with the help of in-built brushes. The 1-2 1-2 inbuilt agitator technology simulates the manual washing style, but in a much more effective manner. This washing machine has been designed to rid the clothes of 7 difficult stains - coffee, tomato sauce, butter, deodorant, crayons, chocolate and jam by subjecting the clothes to a special stain removal cycle. Instant Drying The Turbo Dry technology removes moisture from the clothes, which can be dried within 15 minutes under the sun. There are ergonomic vents in the lid that make the drying process fast and effective. This feature is quite helpful during the rainy season as the clothes can also be dried indoors. Other useful features Whirlpool Ace 8.2 Turbo Dry Semi-automatic Washing Machine comes with a host of features that has made this appliance efficient and easy to use. It has a multipurpose tray where up to 32 kg of unclean clothes can be kept to be washed later. The large wheels and the smart handle make this machine easy to move from one place to another. The ACE Wash Station is an additional feature which is very useful as you can sort, stack and carry clothes within the machine itself. The machine is quite compact in stature and hence occupies little space.

Powerful Washing Machine The Whirlpool is a 6.2 kg Semi-Automatic Top Load Washing Machine (SUPERB ATOM 62I) that comes with a wide range of features. It has a very powerful motor that achieves the speed of 1450 rpm. It not only washes the clothes in a spotless manner but also draws all the moisture from the clothes which can be dried under the sun in just 15 minutes. The body is made of high fibre which offers resistance from rust. It is therefore durable and sturdy in nature. Coming in a white and dark grey colour, it has a modern appeal making it ideal for the contemporary households of today. Having dimensions of 79.3 cm x 90.5 cm x 49.1 cm, this washing machine is compact in nature and has the capacity of 6.2 Kg. It comes with a two-year warranty as well. Power consumption This machine consumes 340 W in the wash mode and150 W in the spin mode. In-Built Memory If for any reason the power supply is interrupted, the Whirlpool 6.2 kg Semi-Automatic Top Load Washing Machine (SUPERB ATOM 62I) remembers the step at which the process was interrupted. When the power is back on, it starts from where it stopped. Description for LG 8 kg Semi-Automatic Top Loading Washing Machine (P9032R3SM(BG), Burgundy)

The LG P9032R3S is a semi automatic washing machine that can comfortably handle eight kg of wash-load under four different wash programs. Besides, it has got a durable and strong body with rust and shock proof features for an enhanced longevity.

Achieves good wash through roller jet pulsator: The LG semi automatic washing machine comes with a roller jet pulsator that adds increased friction into the wash cycle, thereby making them squeaky clean, bereft of any mite or speck of dust.

Punch action to create powerful streams of water: The washing machine works by using its innovative "Punch+3" feature. It makes use of one main pulsator with three mini pulsators that enables the circulation of water through powerful streams. This agitates the laundry to move up and down in the drum, clearing it off all traces of dirt, dust and stain marks.

Dry, ready-to-iron and wear clothes: The LG Semi Automatic Washing Machine dries the laundry with jet speed and is very efficient in doing so. It works by reducing the moisture from the laundry, allows excess air to reach and circulate within the spin tub to remove the last drop of water that has been soaked in the laundry.

Detachable lint filter for better performance: To collect the torn threads and prevent them from reaching and getting stuck in the pipes and the washed clothes, the washing machine has been provided with a detachable lint filter.

Unique collar scrubber for better efficiency: The washing machine also packs in a unique collar scrubber that cleans the collars and cuffs of clothes, thus saving time and effort to a great extent.

From the Manufacturer





Wash Cool, Save Energy

Save a huge amount of energy* by washing large loads at low temperatures using Eco Bubble technology. Bubbles activate detergent, so it quickly penetrates fabric and removes dirt easily – even in cool water (15°C).

Intensive Stain Removal

With the touch of a button Bubble Soak technology helps remove a variety of stubborn stains. Clothes are thoroughly soaked in bubbles, so stains are loosened and removed effectively.






Works smart, It’s durable & trustful

A Digital Inverter Motor delivers superior energy efficiency, minimal noise and exceptionally long-lasting performance, so it's certified to work for 20 years* – backed-up by a 10 year warranty.

Designed to fit

Get the most out of your space. The new Samsung Ecobubble washing machine comes in three depths — 550 mm, 530 mm and 450 mm — so you can install it just about anywhere you want.

Gentle Fabric Care

The Diamond Drum's unique “soft curl” design with smooth, diamond-shaped ridges is supremely gentle on your clothes. Its small water exit holes also help protect fabric by preventing clothes from becoming trapped.









Ceramic heaters, efficient for longer

Ceramic heaters prevent calcium compound build-up which otherwise absorbs more electricity and requires special detergents to dissolve. The quick-heating ability increases energy efficiency and saves you cost.





Safeguards Against Volt Fluctuations

The Volt Control safeguards against power surges and voltage drops, so it protects the life of the machine. It will stabilise voltage fluctuations of ±25% and automatically restart the machine after a power outage.

All is one way with one touch

You’ll be free from frequently resetting the function as you need. You can memorize your favourite cycle with one touch.





Chemical-Free Drum Sanitization

For the ultimate in convenience, Eco Drum Clean technology keeps your front load washer fresh without using harsh chemicals. And it can even notify you automatically when it needs cleaning.

Save Time on Smaller Loads

The Quick Wash programme is the perfect solution for your busy life – cleaning lightly soiled clothes quickly and efficiently, so you can enjoy more time for yourself.

view larger


Most Trusted Brand

Samsung India ranked number one in the Mobile Handsets/Tablets and Consumer Durables categories in the ‘Most Trusted Brands 2016’ annual survey, conducted by The Economic Times - Brand Equity and research firm Nielsen.

About Samsung

Samsung began its journey in India in 1995, and in over two decades, it has grown into one of the country’s biggest consumer product companies, with 2 factories, 3 R&D centres, 1 design centre, 1.5 lakh retail outlets and over 45,000 employees.

Samsung is pioneering local manufacturing through its ‘Make for India’ initiative.

Samsung has strengthened its commitment to provide quality customer service in both urban and rural India by augmenting its service network with 535 service vans. With this, the Samsung India service network has grown to over 3,000 from 2,000 service points earlier, extending its reach to customers in over 6,000 talukas across the country, making Samsung service network the largest in this industry in India. The service vans are equipped with multi skilled engineers, key components, DG sets and key jigs/fixtures for providing quick response and on-spot resolution.

Product description

Product Description

Whirlpool washing machine More than a luxury, a washing machine is an everyday necessity and the requirement of every home. A product of one of the most leading brands in the competitive market of washing machines, this Whirlpool 360 World 72H is a model that will fulfil your everyday laundry needs. The machine comes in a unique graphite colour. Notable features that suit your requirement The Whirlpool 360 World 72H washing machines comes with a top loading facility which allows you to operate the machine without bending. The top lid of the machine is designed to be transparent in order to have a check on what happens inside the machine. In order to allow you to load the machine and wash all the clothes at once, the machine comes with a capacity of 7.2 kg which easily suffices a family of six. Technology at its best to serve you better The Whirlpool 360 World 72H is designed in a manner that it utilizes not more than 1/3rd quantity of water as compared to the other leading machines. The machine comes with an in-built heater that formulates a hot water detergent mixture before it begins the action of washing. This soaking in heated water ensures a good wash for soiled clothes. The clothes are sprayed with the detergent during wash in a manner that it penetrates through every cloth. However, clean water is later sprayed to ensure appropriate cleansing of the clothes. The Whirlpool 360 World 72H makes optimum advantage of the 360 degree tumble motion that ensures that each and every corner of the cloth is thoroughly cleaned. The machine comes with a technology that rotates the clothes in both direction so that the clothes get rubbed and cleaned. Other additional features: The Whirlpool 360 World 72H is completely automatic. Thus, once you command it to wash your clothes, you only have to get back to the machine after they are done with rinsing too. It has as many as 12 washing programs that enable to choose the most apt type depending on the quality of clothes that you put in. The inner tube is of stainless steel which promises a longer and rust free life.

From the Manufacturer

Inbuilt heater
It helps proper enzyme release from detergents by heating water to an optimum level to remove stubborn stains and provide a germ-free and odour-free wash.

Variator Wash System
The Whirlpool 360⁰ Bloomwash comes with the revolutionary Variator plate that washes clothes in multiple inside-out circles in a motion similar to that of a blooming flower. The clothes rub against each other as they get washed in Bloom motion. This ensures that the wash action cleans every part of the fabric, even parts other m=washing machines can never reach.



Catalytic Soak
The whirlpool 360 bloom wash uses 1/3 the water in comparison to another automatic washing machine,therefore using detergent far more effectively. Apart from using less water that makes the detergent act more effectively is the in built heater. The heater helps create a hot detergent solution in which the clothes are soaked before the wash action begins. This maximizes the detergent efficiency and ensure an excellent wash for soiled clothes.

H2LOW Shower
The whirlpool 360 bloom wash use a strong hydro-shower to loosen the dirt particles . During the wash. It sprays he clothes with detergent water that penetrates through every corner of the fabric and during the rinse.it sprays clean water on the fabric to ensure complete detergent removal.

6th Sense Technology Tumble Care
The Whirlpool 360 Bloomwash comes with the intuitive 6th Sense TumbleCare Technology that actually senses the laundry conditions & automatically moves clothes in a unique 360o Tumble Motion, ensuring every corner of the fabric is thoroughly & gently cleaned. It also activates the detergent by making the water reach its optimum temperature thanks to the In-built heater.

name: Whirlpool 6.5 kg Fully-Automatic Top Loading Washing Machine (Stainwash Ultra 65H, Graphite)
description:
• Top-loading washing machine; 65 kg capacity
  • Warranty: 2 years on product and 10 years on motor
  • Program: Daily, heavy, delicate, whites, sari, stainwash, antibacterial 60, woollens, bedsheet, rinse and spin, spin only and wash only
  • Stainless steel inner tub
  • Features: 3D scrub pads, in-built heater, delay start, 6th sense, auto tub clean, magic lint filter, hard water wash, express wash, child lock and ZPF technology

Product description

Color:Grey

Product Description

A technology that meets your daily needs Whirlpool SW Ultra UL 65H comes in a unique graphite colour which differentiates it from most of the machines belonging to the same category. It helps you to fulfil your laundry needs in an efficient manner.

Qualities that suit your requirement: The Whirlpool SW Ultra UL 65H washing machines features a top loading facility which proves to be more practical and suitable to use as one wouldn’t have to bend. The transparent top lid with a grey tint allows you to check what happens inside the machine. The machine comes with a great capacity of 6.5 kg which is more than just sufficient to clean clothes for a family of four on a regular basis.

Technical specifications: The Whirlpool SW Ultra UL 65H comes with the ZPF technology which quickly fills the tub 50percent faster even when the water pressure is as low as 0.017 Mpa. The machine is designed to automatically judge the quality of water, and in case of hard water, it automatically performs in a way that provides better detergent action thus keeping the quality of wash consistent. The machine follows a coded process of six steps in order to remove stains. The Whirlpool SW Ultra UL 65H features technology that sense voltage levels, water pressure, and detergent control. In order to make sure it kills most of the germs, the machine possess an automatic water heater. The Whirlpool SW Ultra UL 65H makes optimum advantage of the 6th sense Stainwash Ultra clean technology that comes with unique soak, scrub and enough agitation to make sure that every part of the cloth is cleaned.

Additional features: The Whirlpool SW Ultra UL 65H is 100percent automatic. The internal tub is made of Stainless steel which ensures longer life.

Carefully browse through the terms and conditions to check if the exchange offer is applicable for your city and location details. You can also check out our buying guide at Amazon India on washing machines for more clarity and information. If you have any queries regarding product availability, exchanges or any other issue, feel free to call our dedicated Toll-Free number: 1800-3000-9027 (Available from 8am to 11pm seven days a week). From the Manufacturer

6th Sense Ultra clean technology

Ultra clean technology-The 6th sense Stainwash Ultra clean technology with its unique soak, 3D scrub, agitation and built-in heater gives deeper penetration of detergent removing 25 tough stains and eliminating 99.9% harmful bacteria.

ZPF Technology

ZPF technology- -Fills tub 50% faster even when the water pressure is low as 0.017MPa, Fastest drum fill time of 5minutes, Works even if the height between the tank and tap is as low as 6 ft.

Hard Water Wash

Hard water wash- The intelligent hard water software adapts the machine programs for washing in hard water giving better detergent action and soft , bright clothes 30% better cleaning in hard water.

99.9% Germ Free

99.9% germ free- The incredible Whirlpool Stainwash built-in heater heats the water through a range if temperatures from 25*c to 60*c to carefully and thoroughly remove 25 types of tough stains .

Easytech

Easytech- Smart diagnostics-Senses the voltage levels and water pressure in the tap;Detergent savings-Senses the load and fabric type and gives the detergent dosage required ;Automatic removal of lint -After every wash, wash gushes through the lint filter removing the lint accumulated during wash.

25 Stain Removal

The machine heats the water through a special 6 step process to carefully and thoroughly remove 25 stains.

name: Haier 6.5 kg Semi-Automatic Top Loading Washing Machine (HTW65-113S-1, Ruby Red)
description:
• Highly efficient motor ensures powerful rotation of clothes
  • Protection from overfilling of clothes in washing machine ensure no damage due to overload
  • Bubbles comes out from the bottom of the tub, hits the rigid stains of the clothes and remove this dirt out from laundry to give your brighter and cleaner clothes
  • Warranty: 1 year on product and 5 years on motor

Description for Haier 6.5 kg Semi-Automatic Top Loading Washing Machine (HTW65-113S-1, Ruby Red)

Haier semi automatic top loading washing machine in wet area of your home is not a problem because plastic cabinet is rust free so it gives better and longer life. This washing machine with active turbo soak wash of 45 minutes ensures proper cleaning of badly soiled clothes. Bubbles comes out from the bottom of the tub, hits the rigid stains of the clothes and remove this dirt out from laundry to give your brighter and cleaner clothes. You can control the volume of end of cycle buzzer. This feature help you to avoid any disturbance. Protection from overfilling of clothes in washing machine ensure no damage due to overload. Washing machine doesn't work while it is overloaded. Highly efficient motor ensures powerful rotation of clothes. Strong motor promises ensures high durability and efficiency to take heavy load. Water inlets in the form of shower and spread on all the laundry, hence no more detergent stains on your washed laundry.

name: LG T8077TEELK Fully-automatic Top-loading Washing Machine (7 Kg, Black Knight)
description:
• Fully-automatic top-loading washing machine
  • 7 kg capacity
  • 8 wash programs
  • Warranty: 2 years comprehensive warranty on product
  • Jet spray+ is a unique washing technology which removes stains completely during wash and rinse
  • When the tub spins, water is sprayed uniformly and forcefully on the clothes from top nozzle, as a result water penetrates into the clothes and removes all detergent stains which gives perfect wash with efficient use of water, energy and time
  • Gently falls down avoiding any slam noise and protects hand from unexpected injury

Description for LG T8077TEELK Fully-automatic Top-loading Washing Machine (7 Kg, Black Knight)

The unique technology that knows how to take care of your clothes while giving you the perfect wash. The dual direction rotating drum reduces tangling of clothes which ensures your clothes stay as fresh and new for much longer than ever before. The machine also is now less susceptible to wear and tear giving you a longer life. Turbodrum allows the movement of the drum in the opposite direction of the pulsator, for a doubly-efficient wash action. LG's auto pre-wash is the easiest option to clear stain-removal concern. With one touch, tough stains are ready to be gone. Let your hands free, let your washing machine do the laundry. Once 8 minutes of pre-wash course ends, normal course begins.pre-wash allows you to pre-treat your clothes with care such an hand pre-wash. At some point in your washer’s life it will need some love and care. We just made the service easier and smarter for you. Now there is no need to wait for an engineer to detect a problem. Just dial smart diagnosis and wait for the telephone to tell you what to do or for a single visit by the service engineer with the solution. This removes the hassles of explaining your problem and saves cost and time. One touch tub clean function helps you to maintain tub clean with ease by removing odor and dirt in drum. Cleaner the tub cleaner the laundry. Make your tub stay clean and hygienic with regular use of tub clean course for hygienic washing.

  • When the tub spins, water is sprayed uniformly and forcefully on the clothes from top nozzle, as a result water penetrates into the clothes and removes all detergent stains which gives perfect wash with efficient use of water, energy and time
  • Gently falls down avoiding any slam noise and protects hand from unexpected injury

name: IFB Serena Aqua SX Fully-automatic Front-loading Washing Machine (7 Kg, White)
description:
• Fully-automatic front-loading washing machine; 6 kg capacity
  • 1 year manufacturer warranty
  • Tumble wash method
  • 1000rpm spin speed
  • In-built heater

Product description

With Serena Aqua SX, dirt becomes a thing of the past and you get more than just a perfect wash. It comes with increased RPM that increases the level of dryness and big door that makes loading and unloading easy. Its features like Water Plus allows you to add more water and Aqua Energie feature turns hard water to soft that helps dissolve the detergent better and prolongs the life of washing machine.

Aqua Energie
A special built-in aqua filter that treats hard water improving the life and performance of your machine. It breaks the bi-carbonates in the water and reduces them to crystals. These crystals are microscopically small and flow with the water instead of forming crusts. The filtered water is soft and facilitates wetting of clothes. The detergent enzymes dissolve in the water giving your clothes a better wash. It reduces scaling on machine components.

Water Plus
An additional spin for extra dirty clothes, Water Plus Program pampers fabrics such as silk and wool by loosening the dirt and washing it away.

2D Shower System
It adds dynamic movement to the water and ensures that you get a cleaner and fresher wash for your clothes anytime. A special water system with nozzles, circulates the water 360 degree in the drum. The detergent dissolves 100% and penetrates the clothes deeper for a cleaner wash. During rinsing, fresh water penetrates deep into the clothes to wash off all traces of detergent. The clothes come out cleaner and fresher.

Crescent Moon Drum
The crescent moon shaped pattern on the inner drum protects clothes during the wash. Water curves up in a swoosh pattern and prevents the clothes from rubbing against the wall of the steel drum. Clothes get a gentle yet thorough cleaning
IFB provides first-of-its-kind 4 year Super Warranty and a 10-year spare parts support along with a wide service network of more than 450 franchisees across 1500+ towns.
short_description:
• Fully-automatic front-loading washing machine; 6 kg capacity
  • 1 year manufacturer warranty
  • Tumble wash method
  • 1000rpm spin speed
  • In-built heater
product_name: IFB Serena Aqua SX Fully-automatic Front-loading Washing Machine (7 Kg, White)

name: Reconnect RHWTB-6202 Fully-automatic Top-loading Washing Machine (6.2 Kg, Grey)
description:
• Fully-automatic top-loading washing machine; 6.2 kg capacity
  • 2 years on product
  • Transparent top lid and LED display
  • Child lock, multi control program choice and stainless steel inner tub

Product description

Complex Pulsator
With 3 nos of small pulsator which can be engendered the water flow with opposite direction results into more cleaning of clothes and also prevent clothes winding.

Magic Filter
The specially designed Magic Cleaning Filter can filter completely residue, and is stronger than usual filter bag, more beautiful and will not damage clothes.

Tempered Glass Window
The Transparent Lid allows you to check the status of your laundry without terminating the cycle. Tempered glass sustains greater weight and is beautiful, durable as well as safe.

Air Dry
Through unique designed lid, the moisture in the clothes is dried by wind to increase dehydrating effect.

Leak Protection
Small gap between pulsator and washing drum base to avoid coins or other object falling into inner drum through gap.

Fuzzy Sense
Automatically sensing clothing weight to match appropriate water volume and washing time.

Auto Balance
Between spinning processes, imbalance status will be adjusted automatically.

Available Wash Programs (6)
Normal, Quick, Silk, Jeans, Anti-Wrinkle, Air Dry

Self Diagnostic
Digital dynamic display shows error code when malfunction, meanwhile, buzzer beeps for 10 seconds to remind user to open lid to solve the problem. If alarm is not canceled, buzzer will beep for 10 seconds every 16 minutes.

Delay Start
Washing start time can be delayed by setting the time for the washing to complete. Setting can be up to 48 hours.

Power off Memory
If the washing cycle is interrupted mid-process, the washing machine memory will remember where the washing cycle has been stopped. When the power supply is back the washing process will resume from the same stage.
short_description:
• Fully-automatic top-loading washing machine; 6.2 kg capacity
  • 2 years on product
  • Transparent top lid and LED display
  • Child lock, multi control program choice and stainless steel inner tub
product_name: Reconnect RHWTB-6202 Fully-automatic Top-loading Washing Machine (6.2 Kg, Grey)

description:
• Fully-automatic front-loading washing machine
  • 6 kg capacity
  • Volt control and anti-lime scale heater stays efficient for longer
  • Warranty: 3 years on product; 10 years warranty on DIT
  • Aqua stop, diamond drum, silver wash, big capacity wild door and user-friendly display
  • Ceramic heater, child lock, delay end, diamond drum type, DIT motor, over heating control and quick wash

Product description


"No more fabric damage

With most conventional washing machines, it is quite common for fabrics to protrude from these holes and be damaged in the process. But with the unique embossed design of the Diamond Drum, the holes are both 43% smaller and located deep within each diamond-shaped depression to prevent fabrics from sticking out and consequently being damaged.

The Diamond Drum's unique “soft curl” design with smooth, diamond-shaped ridges is supremely gentle on your clothes. Its small water exit holes also help protect fabric by preventing clothes from becoming trapped.

A Digital Inverter Motor delivers superior energy efficiency, minimal noise and exceptionally long-lasting performance, so it's certified to work for 20 years – backed-up by a 10 year warranty"

name: Samsung 6.5 kg Fully-Automatic Top Loading Washing Machine (WA65M4300HA/TL, Imperial Silver)
description:
• Fully-automatic top-loading washing machine; 6.5 kg
  • Warranty: 2 years on product; 10 years on motor
  • Wobble pulsator, STS drum type, 6 wash programs, 5 water level, digital LED, tempered glass window
  • Magic filter, diamond drum, water fall, child lock, air turbo, auto restart, eco tub clean
  • Transparent toughened glass lid
  • Maximum spin speed - 680, rat mesh, non activ wash plus

Product description

Samsung washing machine comes with wobble technology provides gentle care of fabrics without compromising washing performance. Wobble pulsators generate a dynamic, multi-directional washing flow that prevents tangles and increases washing power. The diamond drum features a unique soft curl design with smooth, diamond-shaped ridges that's gentle on your clothes. Its small water exit holes also mean fabric is less likely to be trapped and damaged. A tempered glass door makes it easy to see inside, but will last much longer. It’s designed to withstand a great deal of pressure and is resistant to damage and scratches. So it stays looking good for a long time.

name: Samsung 8 kg Fully-Automatic Front Loading Washing Machine (WW80J5210IW/TL, White)
description:
• Fully-automatic front-loading washing machine; 8 kg
  • Warranty: 3 years on product; 10 years on Eco bubble pump; 10 years on digital inverter motor
  • Maximum 1200 RPM, diamond drum, voltage control, crystal gloss design (white), smart check, ceramic heater, digital inverter motor, eco drum clean
  • Panel display - LED, ceramic heater, volt control, child lock, delay end, diamond drum, DIT, quick wash, e cotton, 15 minutes or 30 minutes quick wash, 14 wash programs
  • Baby care, cotton, daily wash, dark garment, delicates, eco drum clean
  • Prewash, intensive, rinse plus spin, wool

Product description

Samsung washing machine comes with a digital inverter motor delivers superior energy efficiency, minimal noise and exceptionally long-lasting performance, so it's certified to work for 20 years – backed-up by a 10 year warranty. Gentle fabric care the diamond drum's unique soft curl design with smooth, diamond-shaped ridges is supremely gentle on your clothes. Its small water exit holes also help protect fabric by preventing clothes from becoming trapped. With the simple touch of a button the Samsung washing machine’s bubble soak technology helps remove a wide variety of normally stubborn stains. It adds an extra phase to a normal washing cycle in which clothes are thoroughly soaked in active bubbles, so any dirt and stains are loosened and can be removed much more effectively. Before the normal cycle begins, the unique bubble generator starts working. It helps dissolve and activate the detergent using air and water to generate bubbles that penetrate faster and more evenly throughout the wash load. This brings the detergent into contact with each fiber in the load.

name: Samsung 6 kg Fully-Automatic Front Loading Washing Machine (WW60M204K0S/TL, Silver)
description:
• Fully-automatic front-loading washing machine; 6 kg
  • Warranty: 3 years on product; 10 years on Eco bubble pump; 10 years on digital inverter motor
  • Maximum 1000 RPM, eco bubble and bubble soak, diamond drum, voltage control, ceramic heater, digital inverter motor, 12 wash cycles, my cycle, easy iron, eco drum clean
  • Panel display - LED, ceramic heater, volt control, child lock, delay end, diamond drum, DIT, quick wash, 15 minutes quick wash, silver body plus chrome door, smart check, touch panel
  • Baby care, cotton, daily wash, delicates, denim, eco drum clean
  • Prewash, intensive, rinse plus spin, wool

Product description

Samsung washing machine comes with a digital inverter motor delivers superior energy efficiency, minimal noise and exceptionally long-lasting performance, so it's certified to work for 20 years – backed-up by a 10 year warranty. Gentle fabric care the diamond drum's unique soft curl design with smooth, diamond-shaped ridges is supremely gentle on your clothes. Its small water exit holes also help protect fabric by preventing clothes from becoming trapped. With the simple touch of a button the Samsung washing machine’s bubble soak technology helps remove a wide variety of normally stubborn stains. It adds an extra phase to a normal washing cycle in which clothes are thoroughly soaked in active bubbles, so any dirt and stains are loosened and can be removed much more effectively. Before the normal cycle begins, the unique bubble generator starts working. It helps dissolve and activate the detergent using air and water to generate bubbles that penetrate faster and more evenly throughout the wash load. This brings the detergent into contact with each fiber in the load.
